Job Description:
1. Develop the visual UX concept for product and services, and structure and visualize it for users.
2. Offer a new experience and sensation to users with the developed visual US concept.
Role and Responsibilities
1. [Research & analysis] Perform research and analysis on the projects/ products requirements, functionalities, market, trend, users, etc.
2. [Visual UX concept design] Define and design the visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles for product usability based on the analysis outcome.
3. [Commercialization design] Develop detailed scenarios based on the derived visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles and design/ draft product development outputs (e.g. GUI guideline, motion design, etc.).
4. [Validation] Perform internal validation, such as PR (Rapid Prototyping), and incorporate external validation results into the final output so improvements can be made.
Skills and Qualifications
Learns to use professional concepts. Applies company policies and procedures to resolve routine issues
Works on problems of limited scope. Follows standard practices and procedures
Normally receives detailed instructions on all work
Typical entry point for university graduates
Keywords: Usage, Concept design, Research analysis

Job Description:
Position Overview: As a Handbag Designer and Merchandiser at Star Global, you will play a pivotal role in both the creative design process and the strategic planning of production and designing. You will collaborate closely with the design, production, and sales teams to bring innovative handbag designs to life while ensuring smooth production and client satisfaction.
Key Responsibilities:
Design Responsibilities:
Conceptualization and Design: Collaborate with the design team to conceive and develop creative concepts for handbags that align with client brand identities, market trends, and consumer preferences.
CAD Proficiency: Utilize CAD software to create detailed sketches, technical drawings, and 3D renderings of handbag designs, ensuring accuracy and precision.
Material and Hardware Selection: Work closely with the materials sourcing team to select appropriate materials, fabrics, and hardware for handbag production while considering cost-effectiveness and quality.
Prototype Development: Oversee the creation of prototypes and samples, making necessary design adjustments based on feedback and practical considerations.

Merchandising and Production Responsibilities:
Production Planning: Develop production plans and schedules, optimising resources and capacity to meet production targets and deadlines.
Cost Management: Monitor and control production costs, ensuring manufacturing remains within budget constraints while maintaining product quality.
BOM Management: Oversee BOM levels of materials of the open orders
Quality Assurance: Collaborate with quality control teams to maintain high product quality standards throughout the production process, ensuring handbags meet client specifications and expectations.
Supplier Coordination: Work closely with material suppliers to secure timely and cost-effective materials as per the required colors and designs.
Client Engagement: Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements and expectations, ensuring that production aligns with client needs and preferences.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Fashion Design or a related field.
Proven experience as a Handbag Designer/Merchandiser with a strong portfolio showcasing CAD skills.
Previous experience or understanding of merchandising, production planning, and inventory management in the fashion industry.
Proficiency in CAD software such as Adobe Illustrator, SolidWorks, or similar tools.
Strong knowledge of handbag construction, materials, and manufacturing processes.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team.
Detail-oriented with a strong focus on quality control.
Strong organisational and time management skills.
Creativity, innovation, and a passion for handbag design.
Keywords: Design, Buyer Communication, merchandising, handbags, Sample Development, Sampling

Job Description:
The Designer will explore and conceptualize design options and solutions that maintain Landor Fitch s vision and creative beliefs- great ideas expertly and beautifully crafted and delivered with rigor and flair . You will work in conjunction with Directors, Senior Designers and fellow Designers, evaluate design options, develop and push to find big ideas based on design strategy and the creative brief. You will develop straightforward design approaches to complex design challenges across packaging, brand development, corporate identity, mobile, digital and user experience design projects.
What we re looking for
A bright designer with a keen eye, a sense of humor, and a taste for challenge. If you are a passionate graphic designer, UI/UX designer, or motion graphic enthusiast, we want to meet you. You will have 2 - 4 years experience in branding and advanced skills in Adobe illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign. You will have gained additional skills in programs such as Flash, After effects, and Final cut.
You will have a Bachelors or Masters degree in Graphic design, communication, design, fine arts, or a related field.
Keywords: communication design, Graphic designing, Illustrator, Corporate identity, Diversity and Inclusion, Consulting, Packaging, Photoshop, User experience design, Fine arts

Job Description:
Ideal candidate will be a thorough professional and should be able to handle visual design with understanding and appreciation of interaction design, information architecture and user experience.
Key Responsibilities :
Work on the layout, visual appearance and usability of the web site. Ensure the designs are visually effective, easy to access interact with and support the business goals and vision
Work with product and business teams and translate product requirements and designbriefs into wireframes
Iterate on the wireframes post formative and summative testing
Work with different personas, user scenarios, UX specs, task flows, wireframes, site maps, storyboards, taxonomies, task flows, mockups, prototypes, visual designs and design patterns
Have understanding of and be able to appreciate the advantages and disadvantages of the primary form factors, viz. desktop/laptop computers and mobile devices (primarily smart phones) and be able to design distinct user experiences for each of them
Ensure designs are optimized for different form factors, browsers, resolutions etc.
Coordinate with outsourced design partners/freelancers and act as a audit and QA function for them
Work on low and high fidelity mockups on paper
Work with developers and testers to make sure whats designed gets translated in code
The ideal candidate for this profile will be someone
With at least 2 years of relevant work experience in web design
A graduate/post graduate from a recognized university/college
Proficient in Adobe Master Collection CS5 (Photoshop, Flash, Illustrator etc.), SQL, ASP/ PHP and Macromedia
Working knowledge of technologies such as CSS, HTML, JS, AJAX is an added advantage
In tune with current web design trends and techniques and upcoming trends
Has a showcase of strong online portfolio of user centred web design
Attention to detail and creative approach to problem solving
Ability to be simplistic even while solving the most complex of design problems
Strong inter-personal skills, intense curiosity, and a desire and ability to "get things done"
Able to thrive in a fast paced and dynamic start up environment
Has a knack to constantly re invent himself/herself through his/her designs which is able to break through the clutter and truly engage the users
Keywords: Illustrator, Interaction design, PHP, HTML, Photoshop, Adobe, ASP, SQL, Ajax, Visual Design

Job Description:
Mentum Ellipse, Link Budget or LB, Microwave Planning/Transmission Planning ( Not Microwave Operations)
MW Equipment Knowledge- Ericsson
Tools: Mentum Ellipse( Must), MapInfo
Below is the complete JD:
5 to 8 years (few with 3-5) of experience in FWA (MW) Design and Planning
Interact with client to understand requirements and translate the requirement into
o Functional specifications, HLD (High Level Design) and LLD (Low Level Design) documents.
Understanding of
o Site engineering ODU/IDU for MW and Installation and Commission Procedures.
o Transmission Capacity analysis, Line of Sight Test
o Link Engineering and Link Budget Hops using Mentum Ellipse tool with proper fade margin calculations and availability.
o SCAFA Frequency Application, Frequency Allocation and Planning,
o Interference Calculation, Hi-Low Violation analysis to maintain the Network availability requirement.
o Preparing BOQ for MW links and Other Transmission related Equipment and cards based on the requirement.
o Monitoring Transmission parameters such as Frequency, Capacity, Hi-low violations, Visibility, ATPC Enabling, Rx level
o Designing Microwave links for Greenfield sites and BW upgrade/degrade for existing links as per customer request.
o Preparing HLD for existing Network to ensure Max capacity as possible on each link and proper Fiber POP utilization.
o Rectifying RSL Deviation case given by field team.
o MW Planning strategy & implementation processes.
o E2E MW Network Domains, Implementation Phases, Site Build and Acquisition Processes.
o E2E Process Flow and Technical Architecture of FWA Design Services & Deployment Services
o Liaising with Lease provider and government agencies for regulatory permits, power connections
Exposure to Scripts, System Integration and OSS system
Experience in RAN/MW LTE and 4G/5G configurations skills and experience of I&C of Ericsson Nodes.
Keywords: Strategy implementation, Boq Preparation, Networking, System integration, Transmission, High level design, Technical architecture, Budgeting, Capacity analysis, Monitoring

Job Description:
Responsible to deliver NT Sub-System Radio specifications and architecture consistent with the System Delivery Plan
Contributor to support NT Sub-System Radio deployment activities (Installation, Test Commissioning)
What are my responsibilities
Elaborate NT Radio Design specifications and architecture (Preliminary Design Detailed Design) in line with contractual requirements and NT Engineering rules. Rely on best practices inherited from previous projects (cross reviews with installation teams, cybersecurity teams, power experts )
Develop and elicit Radio Design requirements in line with project needs (internal external), with a specific focus on Radio spectrum management and Cybersecurity concerns
Study of country specific spectrum standards/regulations for usage of RF products to be deployed for the project
Identify specific technology requirements / gaps in collaboration with Product Architects.
Ensure that all NT Radio Design elaboration follows Quality processes, including application of Adapt and Design NT Processes, Methods and Guidelines
Ensure that Radio Design documents remain in line with project DFQ Gate Reviews milestones and are elaborated as per project Documentation plan
Minimize, by Design, the NT Radio deployment cost, lead time and risks
Prepare Execute Radio Interference surveys, Radio trackside surveys, Radio Train surveys and Radio Coupling tests
Elaborate NT Radio Bill of Quantity (BoQ), including Design elaboration of dedicated Radio enclosure
Open and follow technical Change Requests to Product Engineering teams in charge of NT products and solutions
Participate to the support of the functional validation phase of the sub-system (FIVP) for Radio part
Participate upon request, to Installation TC activities support activities in order to validate E2E performance : Radio Installation studies, Golden samples, Radio tuning activities, including support to troubleshooting tasks
Collect and consolidate Return of Experience (REX) to Product Engineering teams and to NT Project Engineering teams
Provide iteration of the installation studies specific to NT sub-system
Provide iteration of the Radio configuration files all along project life cycle till end of warranty period,
Prepare and execute DCS Radio Training
What do I need to qualify for this job
Educational Requirements
Mandatory:
BE/Master s degree in Engineering with 10+ yrs of relevant experience
Design/Engineering background
Experience
Mandatory:
Experience of radio deployments in industrial environment, including interference mitigation
Wifi protocol knowledge
Proven experience on monitoring tools and techniques (spectrum analyzer, IP analyzer, mib principles, etc)
Desirable:
Knowledgeable of interpersonal skills
Experience of technical coordination
4G/LTE knowledge
Resilience
Competencies Skills
Strong knowledge and experience on Radio propagation and on Radio solutions with a specific focus on WiFi deployments (802.11a/b/n/ac)
Experience in IT/Supervision is an add-on.
Signaling and system architecture is an add-on.
Rigorous, process oriented,
Team player,
Result oriented
Keywords: Telecom, System architecture, Product engineering, SAP, RF, Radio, Project life cycle, Recruitment, Spectrum

Job Description:
Do you possess the delicate balance of research, analysis, and visual thinking
Do you have a passion for gaming as a player and as a User Experience designer
Do you aspire to continuously learn and develop new, unique methodologies with the best in the domain
Zynga is looking for a creative, dynamic Experience Designer like you to join our team!
You will be responsible for crafting user-centered design solutions that promote ease of use, employ best-in-class game/interaction design, and optimize the user experience universally.
This includes all phases of the design process including conceptual design/development, Interaction models, prototypes, user/task flows, usability evaluation and interface design.
You will work closely with UX Lead/Manager to establish, maintain the visual integrity, interaction methods, brand standards, and consistency for the game, and collaborate with partner functions for execution of the final product.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Approach work with consideration for the overall experience and flow of a product. Employ a strategic, methodical design process that organizes the needs of the players, development, and business goals considering the scope as well as limitations of the pipeline.
Collaborate with stakeholders to set the North Star for a product and then break that into smaller achievable, measurable outcomes.
Approach deliverables, for example, UI Kits with a systems-oriented mindset that is organized, easy to use by all and extensible/scalable for the future.
Use well-known interaction models and patterns when designing for learnability, engagement, and delight to appeal to a broad audience.
Utilize pre-visualization techniques such as user flows, wireframes, and interactive prototypes to quickly explore and assess various directions to help build consensus and guide the project toward a final conceptual target.
Actively analyze other top-performing, innovative games and genres in the marketplace to identify and understand the trends, behaviors with other developers and audiences, and then apply that insight to our product development.
Work to understand, support and conduct research activities (Qualitative Quantitative) and apply the learnings.
Actively build a technical understanding of the platform s abilities, limitations and engage best practices.
Deliver high-quality presentations that are well organized and easy to understand by non-UXers. Moderate design critiques that allow people to be heard while keeping the discussion on track and moving forward and always keeping the player experience (user empathy) the center of attention/decision making.
Keywords: Interaction design, Design development, Research, Research analysis, Gaming, ux lead

Job Description:
Product Design: Use CREO software to create 3D models and designs of products based on engineering specifications and design requirements
Parametric Modeling: Utilize parametric modeling techniques to create flexible and easily modifiable 3D models that can be adjusted based on design changes
Component Assembly: Assemble individual parts and components into complete product assemblies, ensuring proper fit and functionality
Design Optimization: Analyze and optimize designs for factors such as strength, weight, manufacturability, and cost-effectiveness
Collaboration: Work closely with engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand design requirements and incorporate feedback into the designs
Prototype Development: Support the development of prototypes based on the 3D models to test and validate the design
CAD Standards: Adhere to company and industry CAD standards to maintain consistency and compatibility in design files
Keywords: Mechanical engineering

Job Description:
Cyient is working on projects within the thermal power plant, oil gas, and nuclear sectors, focusing on designing support for these projects. We are seeking candidates with a professional background encompassing 4 to 8 years of relevant experience, capable of effectively executing project tasks and responsibilities.
Specific Accountabilities Responsibilities:
Apply recognized onshore and offshore engineering practices applicable to piping design.
Demonstrate good interpersonal skills by liaising with members of other disciplines and departments.
Show an awareness and willingness to work within the team.
Adhere to Quality Assurance guidelines and provisions within the Quality Assurance systems.
Take responsibility for personal safety and work within Occupational Health Safety procedures.
Essential Skills/Experience:
Diploma in engineering or equivalent.
Minimum of 4 to 8 years of proven experience in detailed piping design acquired from design contractors and/or oil/gas companies within the power and petrochemical industry.
Proficiency in reviewing PID, PFDs, and vendor documents (such as GA drawings of equipment, instruments valves).
Ability to route pipes in PDMS E3D with reference to PID and relevant codes.
Knowledge of relevant codes and standards such as ASME B31.1 B31.3.
Experience in modeling piping, structural, electrical components, equipment, and pipe supports.
Capability to deliver error-free isometrics/drawings on time.
Familiarity with checking piping design deliverables.
Proficient in preparing piping general arrangement and pipe support drawings.
Skilled in preparing Material Take-Offs (MTO).
Competence in identifying and resolving clashes in design.
Strong communication skills and coordination abilities with other disciplines.
Proficiency in preparing various piping deliverables such as Plot Plans, Piping Layouts, Equipment Layouts, Isometrics, etc
Ability to work independently.
Participation in a piping design team for at least three major Greenfield projects with a recognized company in the Power/Oil Gas Industry.
At least 3 years of experience as a user of PDMS, E3D AutoCAD applicable to piping layout and design.
A committed team player capable of working with minimal supervision.
Exposure to fabrication, construction, and installation activities, although detailed involvement is not essential.
Familiarity with relevant codes and standards such as ASME B31.1 B31.3.
Matching Indicators:
Power sector expertise
Boiler layout familiarity
Proficiency in PDMS E3D
Min 4 years experience in PDMS E3D tool
Layout experience
Skills Experience
AVEVA PDMS, PDMS, Piping Layouts
Keywords: Fabrication, Semiconductor, AutoCAD, Aerospace, thermal, Valves, Healthcare, Occupational health, Piping design, Petrochemical

Job Description:
Mission / Scope of Work:
Assigned to a project, he/she is in charge of the generation of the documents and deliverables assigned to him/her Project Leader guaranteeing the quality,
the assigned time.
The Designer reports to the Project Leader for the peculiarities of the project and to the Head of the Department for the man-hours and quality of the deliverables.
Have adequate knowledge in Quality & HSE Management system and their applicability in Static Equipment function
Key Activities & Responsibilities:
The duties of the Designer are:
To guarantee the quality of the generated deliverables and their compliance with the
company standards, procedures and work instructions;
To keep him/herself up-to-date about the technical specific improvement of the
discipline;
To assure that all the information originated by other departments (nozzle orientation,
definition of supports for ladders, platforms and piping, type and position of the
brackets, etc.) are correctly transferred in the master copy of each mechanical
specification and then inserted in the fabrication Vendor drawings;
To prepare the engineering drawings of pressure and atmospheric equipment assigned
to him. Provide for the final issue of mechanical specifications;
To study and develop the details of equipment internals and define the main fabrication
details of the equipment to be shown on the engineering drawings;
To improve Knowledge and use of Cad Tools.
To check the fabrication drawings prepared by Vendors, in particular verify the
interferences among nozzles, welds, reinforcing rings, supports, etc., auditing the
congruence with the specifications, the standards and the contractual documents and
the interface with equipment and accessories supplied by other Vendor

Education Background:
Diploma in Engineering / ITI (Mechanical)
Experience Required:
According to the expertise, he/she may have working experience on engineering companies and / or equipment manufacturing vendors. Adequate Knowledge of various Codes (ASME, API, EN, IS, DIN, JIS, etc.) and local regulations.
Keywords: Static Equipment Design, ASME, Cad, DIN, engineering drawing

Job Description:
1. Writing Specification
Refer ECU/SYSTEM/ PROCEDURAL INFORMATION /Functional Specification/ Production plan
Refer wiring diagram for connection topology
Decide method (104,106/ 108,111) to address the fault type/generic method to address fault through symptom
2. Coding Specification
Refer procedural information to know resources (STATUS , PARAMTER , ACTUATOR , IDENTIFICATION , CHANGE PARAMETER, etc) to be coded/modified
Note down the resource parameters (operational conditions) to code for the resources
Note down the corresponding contributors for each resource and do contributor association in session
3. SIE in Quality file
Refer input specification (functional spec., production plan
Download Quality-File from Docing
Note down the contributor SIE from input specification, and copy the same in Quality file
Check the SIE s under different quality guidelines specified in the quality check grid
Upload the Quality-file in Docing again
Send Delivery mail to conceptor
4. Session Delivery using Session patch
Required to deliver SG, FG file for re-delivery or session modification after J7
Same process as normal session delivery but with Patch tag (PATCH_DVDxxx)
5. Validation
To ensure the diagnostics procedure and Diagnostics trouble code is getting validated for respective vehicles.
To ensure the read and write commands are getting validated.
6. Customer Satisfaction
Ensure training and development needs are met and provide development opportunities
Support building of capacity development plans and ensure that competencies for future are developed within the team
Keywords: Usage, Quality check, Diagnostics, Coding, Customer satisfaction, Production planning, Training and Development, Research, Operations

Job Description:
This role will oversee and coordinate all aspects of assigned NPD and Localisation projects to meet technical, schedule, and cost requirements. Primary responsibilities include initiating, planning, executing, controlling and closing business-critical projects and properly managing resources to execute projects that align with strategic organizational goals. The engineer will also participate in long term planning and forecasting of product road maps, localisation and other strategic actions. The successful candidate will be well-versed in all phases of the product life cycle from concept to launch and be able to develop trusting relationships within all levels and functions of the business.
Objective of this position
Lead and implement all the Localisation activities (desin related) and new product development (NPD) activities in NASH Pune related to Liquid Ring Vacuum Pump/Compressor, Centrifugal Blower/Turo Blower & Dry Screw Vacuum Pump products.
Support LRVP/Blower package engineering activities to ensure that all the good engineering practices/standards are followed during the design phase & system design is optimum.
Support on other design/package engineering related activities.
Co-ordinate with teams while working with Autodesk Vault / PTC Windchill
Interrogate designs using FEA and other mathematical tools to minimize risk of large design changes as a result of development test results, including burst testing
Principal duties and responsibilities:
Identify new cost reduction opportunities
Coordinate local site with the other NASH/IR Region product development activities.
Conduct Cost Analysis of components, developed cost calculator tools, identify key characteristics that drive product cost and investigate and developed methods for cost reduction.
Develops detailed project schedule and monitors and reports progress to cross-functional and management teams
Analyzes historical project execution data to forecast time and resources needed to reach project objectives and manage resources in an effective an efficient manner
Develop close relationships across all departments to support buy-in to new solutions.
Essential Functions
Design & Development
Design and develop components and assemblies for use on liquid ring vacuum pumps & blowers. Detail drawings and define materials surface finish requirements. Liaise with suppliers to ensure components are manufactured to drawing using a repeatable process.
Lead on bills of material and assembly drawings, liaise with project team to ensure all required information is available to allow full specification of complete assemblies
Use FEA and other analysis software to optimise the system components to reduce the weight/cost based on the project requirement.
Design and develop complex castings for use on Liquid Ring Vacuum Pumps and compressors. Detail drawings and define materials based on strength and surface finish requirements. Liaise with foundries to ensure cast components are manufactured to drawing using a repeatable process.
Use FEA and other mathematical tools and specify and monitor burst tests to ensure castings meet all requirements specified by project team.
Oversee and coordinate all aspects of assigned NPD and i2V projects to meet technical, schedule, and cost requirements.
Performs various structural finite element analysis including Static Linear/Non-linear, Modal, Transient, Frequency response, multi body dynamics etc
Planning
Produce a full range of documentation and ensure suitable change control is implemented.
Produce and implement supplier visit plans to maximize effectiveness of time spent out of office.
Prepare material masters and bills of material and other ERP data as necessary.
Monitor the progress of project equipment through design and build process and help resolve any issues impacting progress.
Cost Management
Monitor project costs and/or adjustments, paying attention to the original targets set and advising management when deviations occur.
Visit suppliers as necessary to ensure good technical understanding/compliance.
Timelines
Develop project time estimates and product cost comparisons, commercial parts and technical data.
Production
Create test procedures for projects and oversees factory acceptance tests.
May oversee production processes, suggesting changes in working methods or sequences in order to improve efficiencies of project timelines.
Documentation
Co-ordinates and maintains all Engineering documents and design change information at the facility.
Creates functional descriptions/procedures for specific projects.
Quality
Follows ISO guidelines regarding design and production of new/revised products. Assists manufacturing and quality control in correcting any problems encountered in the machine shop or on the assembly floor.
QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelor s degree or Master s degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent with 6-8 years of experience in Pump/Compressor industry. Project management certification preferred.
Key Competencies:
Strong mechanical aptitude and understanding of rotating equipment and package operation, design principles and manufacturing processes like Casting, machining etc.
Passionate self-starter, with demonstrated knowledge, experience and drive to inspire and coach others to reach their full potential
Strong interpersonal and communication skills with a collaborative approach to problem solving
Excellent organizational skills with the ability to manage time and resources effectively through change and ambiguity
Proficient in the use of MS office tools like Word, Excel, Power Point and Outlook
Prefer experience using PM (MS Project or equivalent), PLM (Windchill or equivalent), CAD, Autodesk Inventor and other tools as needed.
UG / NX experience is preferred.
Keywords: PLM, ERP, ISO, Project management, CAD, System design, Machine shop, Manager Quality Control, Finite element analysis, Principal

Job Description:
Hello Folks,


"Immediate requirement for Clothing Designer"

A Clothing Designer is responsible for creating, developing, and designing clothing and apparel items that align with current fashion trends, brand aesthetics, and customer preferences. This role requires a combination of creativity, technical skills, market awareness, and an understanding of fabric and garment construction.


Role & responsibilities

Design Conceptualization:

Collaborate with the design team, brand managers, and other stakeholders to develop seasonal or collection concepts.

Create mood boards, sketches, and initial design concepts that reflect the brand's identity and target audience.

Trend Analysis:

Stay up-to-date with fashion trends, colors, materials, and styles through research, attending fashion shows, and monitoring competitors.

Translate trend insights into innovative and marketable clothing designs.

Fabric and Material Selection:

Source and select appropriate fabrics, textiles, and materials based on design requirements, quality, and cost considerations.

Work closely with suppliers and manufacturers to ensure availability of chosen materials.

Technical Drawings and Specifications:

Create detailed technical drawings and specifications that outline garment measurements, construction details, and sewing instructions.

Pattern Development:

Collaborate with pattern makers to create patterns based on design sketches and technical specifications.

Ensure patterns are precise and accurate for mass production.

Cost Analysis:

Collaborate with the production team to assess the cost implications of various design elements and make cost-effective design decisions.

Portfolio Development:

Continuously update and expand your portfolio with new designs and collections to showcase your work and creativity.

Preferred candidate profile

Strong understanding of textiles, fabrics, and materials.
Excellent creative and artistic skills.
Attention to detail and precision in design work.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Ability to adapt to changing fashion trends and market demands.
Time management and project management skills.
Knowledge of production processes and quality control in the fashion industry.


6 Days Working | Work form office | Location - Mantri, Pune


"Interested candidates kindly sent your cv on tdesai@ondirect.in or whats-app - 7738261581



Best Regards,
HR Tejashree
Keywords: Clothing Designer, Fashion Designer

Job Description:
This role will oversee and coordinate all aspects of assigned NPD and Localisation projects to meet technical, schedule, and cost requirements. Primary responsibilities include initiating, planning, executing, controlling and closing business-critical projects and properly managing resources to execute projects that align with strategic organizational goals. The engineer will also participate in long term planning and forecasting of product road maps, localisation and other strategic actions. The successful candidate will be well-versed in all phases of the product life cycle from concept to launch and be able to develop trusting relationships within all levels and functions of the business.
Objective of this position
Lead and implement all the Localisation activities (desin related) and new product development (NPD) activities in NASH Pune related to Liquid Ring Vacuum Pump/Compressor, Centrifugal Blower/Turo Blower & Dry Screw Vacuum Pump products.
Support LRVP/Blower package engineering activities to ensure that all the good engineering practices/standards are followed during the design phase & system design is optimum.
Support on other design/package engineering related activities.
Co-ordinate with teams while working with Autodesk Vault / PTC Windchill
Interrogate designs using FEA and other mathematical tools to minimize risk of large design changes as a result of development test results, including burst testing
Principal duties and responsibilities:
Identify new cost reduction opportunities
Coordinate local site with the other NASH/IR Region product development activities.
Conduct Cost Analysis of components, developed cost calculator tools, identify key characteristics that drive product cost and investigate and developed methods for cost reduction.
Develops detailed project schedule and monitors and reports progress to cross-functional and management teams
Analyzes historical project execution data to forecast time and resources needed to reach project objectives and manage resources in an effective an efficient manner
Develop close relationships across all departments to support buy-in to new solutions.
Essential Functions
Design & Development
Design and develop components and assemblies for use on liquid ring vacuum pumps & blowers. Detail drawings and define materials surface finish requirements. Liaise with suppliers to ensure components are manufactured to drawing using a repeatable process.
Lead on bills of material and assembly drawings, liaise with project team to ensure all required information is available to allow full specification of complete assemblies
Use FEA and other analysis software to optimise the system components to reduce the weight/cost based on the project requirement.
Design and develop complex castings for use on Liquid Ring Vacuum Pumps and compressors. Detail drawings and define materials based on strength and surface finish requirements. Liaise with foundries to ensure cast components are manufactured to drawing using a repeatable process.
Use FEA and other mathematical tools and specify and monitor burst tests to ensure castings meet all requirements specified by project team.
Oversee and coordinate all aspects of assigned NPD and i2V projects to meet technical, schedule, and cost requirements.
Performs various structural finite element analysis including Static Linear/Non-linear, Modal, Transient, Frequency response, multi body dynamics etc
Planning
Produce a full range of documentation and ensure suitable change control is implemented.
Produce and implement supplier visit plans to maximize effectiveness of time spent out of office.
Prepare material masters and bills of material and other ERP data as necessary.
Monitor the progress of project equipment through design and build process and help resolve any issues impacting progress.
Cost Management
Monitor project costs and/or adjustments, paying attention to the original targets set and advising management when deviations occur.
Visit suppliers as necessary to ensure good technical understanding/compliance.
Timelines
Develop project time estimates and product cost comparisons, commercial parts and technical data.
Production
Create test procedures for projects and oversees factory acceptance tests.
May oversee production processes, suggesting changes in working methods or sequences in order to improve efficiencies of project timelines.
Documentation
Co-ordinates and maintains all Engineering documents and design change information at the facility.
Creates functional descriptions/procedures for specific projects.
Quality
Follows ISO guidelines regarding design and production of new/revised products. Assists manufacturing and quality control in correcting any problems encountered in the machine shop or on the assembly floor.
QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelor s degree or Master s degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent with 6-8 years of experience in Pump/Compressor industry. Project management certification preferred.
Key Competencies:
Strong mechanical aptitude and understanding of rotating equipment and package operation, design principles and manufacturing processes like Casting, machining etc.
Passionate self-starter, with demonstrated knowledge, experience and drive to inspire and coach others to reach their full potential
Strong interpersonal and communication skills with a collaborative approach to problem solving
Excellent organizational skills with the ability to manage time and resources effectively through change and ambiguity
Proficient in the use of MS office tools like Word, Excel, Power Point and Outlook
Prefer experience using PM (MS Project or equivalent), PLM (Windchill or equivalent), CAD, Autodesk Inventor and other tools as needed.
UG / NX experience is preferred.
Keywords: PLM, ERP, ISO, Project management, CAD, System design, Machine shop, Manager Quality Control, Finite element analysis, Principal

The work is often challenging and fast - paced.
Many organisations have marketing departments, meaning that marketing executives can be found in both the private and public sectors, ranging from the financial, retailing and media industries to voluntary and public sector organisations.
The responsibilities of marketing executives vary depending on the size of the organisation and sector and whether the focus is on selling a product or service, or on raising awareness of an issue that affects the public.
Marketing executives may also be known as marketing officers or coordinators.

Job Description:
Designer
A web designer is responsible for creating the design and layout of a website or web pages. It and can mean working on a brand new website or updating an already existing site. Their role is different to web developers, who specialise in making web designs a reality or writing code that dictates how different parts of the website fit together. However, there can be crossover between the two roles.
Responsibilities of the job include:
1.creating website designs.
2.producing sample sites.
3.meeting with clients to discuss requirements and/or project progress.
4.demonstrating and receiving feedback about draft sites.
5.keeping up to date with recent technological and software developments.
6.developing skills and expertise in appropriate software/programming languages such as HTML and Javascript.
7.creating products that are user-friendly, effective and appealing.
8.digital retouching and image editing.
9.working as part of a multidisciplinary team.
10.There can be some pressure to meet deadlines and so extra hours may be required..
Qualifications and training required
There are routes into web design for both university graduates and school leavers. For jobs advertised to graduates, employers are likely to seek a degree in digital media design or a related subject. Whether you have a related degree or not, you will need to be able to present a portfolio of your best web design work.Key skills for web designers:- 1.Imagination.
2.Creativity.
3.Patience.
4.Attention to detail.
5.Analytical skills.
6.Communication skills.
7.Technical ability.
8.Excellent IT skills.
9.SEO knowledge.
10.Experience of using programmes such as PhotoShop and InDesign.
Keywords: Analytical skills, Digital media, Image editing, IT skills, Javascript, Programming, HTML, Web designing, Photoshop, SEO

Job Description:
1. Develop the visual UX concept for product and services, and structure and visualize it for users.
2. Offer a new experience and sensation to users with the developed visual US concept.
Role and Responsibilities
1. [Research & analysis] Perform research and analysis on the projects/ products requirements, functionalities, market, trend, users, etc.
2. [Visual UX concept design] Define and design the visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles for product usability based on the analysis outcome.
3. [Commercialization design] Develop detailed scenarios based on the derived visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles and design/ draft product development outputs (e.g. GUI guideline, motion design, etc.).
4. [Validation] Perform internal validation, such as PR (Rapid Prototyping), and incorporate external validation results into the final output so improvements can be made.
Skills and Qualifications
Learns to use professional concepts. Applies company policies and procedures to resolve routine issues
Works on problems of limited scope. Follows standard practices and procedures
Normally receives detailed instructions on all work
Typical entry point for university graduates

Job Description:
Mission / Scope of Work:
Assigned to a project, he/she is in charge of the generation of the documents and deliverables assigned to him/her Project Leader guaranteeing the quality,
the assigned time.
The Designer reports to the Project Leader for the peculiarities of the project and to the Head of the Department for the man-hours and quality of the deliverables.
Have adequate knowledge in Quality & HSE Management system and their applicability in Static Equipment function
Key Activities & Responsibilities:
The duties of the Designer are:
To guarantee the quality of the generated deliverables and their compliance with the
company standards, procedures and work instructions;
To keep him/herself up-to-date about the technical specific improvement of the
discipline;
To assure that all the information originated by other departments (nozzle orientation,
definition of supports for ladders, platforms and piping, type and position of the
brackets, etc.) are correctly transferred in the master copy of each mechanical
specification and then inserted in the fabrication Vendor drawings;
To prepare the engineering drawings of pressure and atmospheric equipment assigned
to him. Provide for the final issue of mechanical specifications;
To study and develop the details of equipment internals and define the main fabrication
details of the equipment to be shown on the engineering drawings;
To improve Knowledge and use of Cad Tools.
To check the fabrication drawings prepared by Vendors, in particular verify the
interferences among nozzles, welds, reinforcing rings, supports, etc., auditing the
congruence with the specifications, the standards and the contractual documents and
the interface with equipment and accessories supplied by other Vendor

Education Background:
Diploma in Engineering / ITI (Mechanical)
Experience Required:
According to the expertise, he/she may have working experience on engineering companies and / or equipment manufacturing vendors. Adequate Knowledge of various Codes (ASME, API, EN, IS, DIN, JIS, etc.) and local regulations.

Job Description:
1. Writing Specification
Refer ECU/SYSTEM/ PROCEDURAL INFORMATION /Functional Specification/ Production plan
Refer wiring diagram for connection topology
Decide method (104,106/ 108,111) to address the fault type/generic method to address fault through symptom
2. Coding Specification
Refer procedural information to know resources (STATUS , PARAMTER , ACTUATOR , IDENTIFICATION , CHANGE PARAMETER, etc) to be coded/modified
Note down the resource parameters (operational conditions) to code for the resources
Note down the corresponding contributors for each resource and do contributor association in session
3. SIE in Quality file
Refer input specification (functional spec., production plan
Download Quality-File from Docing
Note down the contributor SIE from input specification, and copy the same in Quality file
Check the SIE s under different quality guidelines specified in the quality check grid
Upload the Quality-file in Docing again
Send Delivery mail to conceptor
4. Session Delivery using Session patch
Required to deliver SG, FG file for re-delivery or session modification after J7
Same process as normal session delivery but with Patch tag (PATCH_DVDxxx)
5. Validation
To ensure the diagnostics procedure and Diagnostics trouble code is getting validated for respective vehicles.
To ensure the read and write commands are getting validated.
6. Customer Satisfaction
Ensure training and development needs are met and provide development opportunities
Support building of capacity development plans and ensure that competencies for future are developed within the team
Keywords: Usage, Quality check, Diagnostics, Coding, Customer satisfaction, Production planning, Training and Development, Research, Operations

Job Description:
The primary purpose of this job is pre-sales support to Herman Miller sales and dealer teams spread accors the globe,based in Bangalore office
This role will be responsible to provide space planning and optimization, preparation of specification of products as per RFP and bid requirements, creating 2D and 3D CAD drawings, take offs (BOQs) and pricing for projects globally as per the Herman Miller standards
Specific responsibilities
Provide support to sales through product application design, space planning and layout optimization, product list and pricing for clients globally.
Should be capable of extracting the design brief from the sales managers, understanding customer's priorities and requirements, and communicate with them fluently during various stages of the projects.
Proficiency with space planning and optimization, value engineering, creating product specfications, CAD drawings i.e typicals drawings with detials, floor plans options, BOQ and accurate pricing.
Should have utmost concern for quality of work in terms of clarity on drawings and accuracy on product lists/BOQs, attention to details and presentation.
Coordinate with the product management and specials/options team for any non-standard application as per the requirement of customer, followup with the options team to the pricing and related drawings.
Project Management and Customer Coordination :
a) Project performance management and reporting: Able to estimate the scope of work, execute the project plan, record progress, and report status to Team lead/Manager.
b) Interacting with the internal stakeholders at various stages of the projects for design briefing, approvals and project closure.
d) Keeping a tab on the hours spent on a project and update the tracker on a daily basis.
e) Constant upgrading and updating oneself with the latest in the industry and technical knowledge and incomparision with Herman Miller and affiliated product lines.
f) Meeting project delivery deadline every single time without any misses or excuses.
g) Pitching in as a team player to help each other ensuring quality accurate work is delivered within the stipulated timelines and accountable for the work done.
h) Work with Team lead and Manager to ensure the service level agreements (SLAs) with respect to the role are met.
i) Mantian good professional connect with the clients / team members / TL / Managers.
Contacts and relationships
Internal contacts:
Global Business Services Manager
Reporting into Product Application Team Lead/Manager
Sales team, design team, options team, product managers globally
External contacts:
Dealer sales and design staff
Essential:
Degree/Diploma level education. (business or design related)
A minimum of 3-5 years of proven design application/sales support success.
Proficient in AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, CET (Configura)
Should be willing to be flexible in terms of working shifts
Detail oriented and possess analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and as a team player
Good English communication skills
Desirable.
Previous employment with an International company.
Experience in office furniture industry.
Willing to work in Noon shift ( UK Shif ) 12-00 to 9-00,if required.
Competences
Essential:
Customer Focus
Dealing with ambiguity
Business literacy with a broad commercial awareness.
Articulate.
Excellent communication/presentation skills.
Proven motivational and influencing skills.
Good administration skills.
Good CAD skills
Proficient in MS Office.
Characteristics
Essential:
Organised
Multi-Tasker
Flexible
Confident and presentable.
Self-motivated
Go getter
People skills
Keywords: AutoCAD, Project management, Value engineering, CAD, Presales, REVIT, MS Office, Resource management, RFP, space planning

Job Description:
The Conversation Designer will play a pivotal role in shaping the voice and conversational experiences of our intelligent virtual agentsand ensuring the linguistic accuracy of our AI-driven platforms. Leveraging a strong background in linguistics and prior experience in building virtual agents, the candidate will be responsible for crafting intuitive, engaging, and coherent conversations between users and our AI.
This role sits within our Product team that s responsible for industry solutions. We re looking for candidates with experience designing intelligent virtual agents in sectors like banking, insurance, telecommunications, travel, retail, and healthcare.
Key Responsibilities
Conversation Design:
Develop and optimize conversational flows and scripts for intelligent virtual agents, ensuring a seamless and natural user experience.
Utilize linguistic expertise to enhance the natural language understanding and generation capabilities of our virtual agents.
User Experience (UX) Design:
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to ensure that conversational designs align with the overall user experience and visual design principles.
Conduct user testing sessions and gather feedback to continuously improve conversational experiences.
Compliance and Accessibility:
Ensure all conversational designs adhere to regulatory compliance and accessibility standards.
Stay updated with industry standards and regulations related to conversational interfaces.
Collaboration with Multidisciplinary Teams:
Work with engineers, product managers, and data scientists to train, test, and refine the AI models, ensuring optimal performance and understanding of user intents.
Collaborate with content creators to ensure brand consistency in conversational dialogues.
Data Analysis and Optimization:
Apply linguistic knowledge to analyze and refine conversation patterns, ensuring cultural and linguistic appropriateness.
Analyze conversational data and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
Implement adjustments to conversational flows and scripts based on data-driven insights.
Documentation and Knowledge Sharing:
Maintain comprehensive documentation of conversational designs, decision trees, and user interactions.
Share knowledge and insights with team members to foster continuous learning and improvement.
Stay Updated with Industry Trends:
Keep abreast of the latest developments and trends in conversation design, linguistics, and AI technology.
Participate in relevant workshops, webinars, and conferences to enhance professional growth.
Qualifications:
Educational Background:
Bachelor s or master s degree in Linguistics, Computational Linguistics, Cognitive Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Language, Humanities, or a related field.

Experience:
3-5 years of experience in conversation design, preferably for intelligent virtual agents or chatbots.
Proven track record of designing and optimizing conversational experiences.
Skills:
Linguistic Expertise: Strong understanding of syntax, semantics, and pragmatics to craft natural and coherent dialogues.
Technical Proficiency: Basic understanding of NLP, machine learning, and AI technologies.
Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data and user feedback to derive actionable insights.
User-Centric Design: Proficiency in employing user-centric design principles and methodologies.
Collaboration: Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Tools:
Experience with conversational AI platforms and tools (e.g., Dialogflow, Rasa, etc.)
Familiarity with data analysis tools and platforms.
Keywords: Analytical skills, Automation, Data analysis, Talent acquisition, Machine learning, Banking, Linguistics, Regulatory compliance, Healthcare

Job Description:
An HR Generalist is responsible for executing various human resources (HR) functions within an organization.
Key responsibilities include:
Recruiting and staffing: sourcing, screening, and hiring new employees.
Employee relations: addressing and resolving employee concerns, complaints, and conflicts.
Performance management: conducting performance evaluations and providing feedback to employees.
Employee development: creating and implementing employee training programs and career development plans.
Compensation and benefits: administering employee compensation and benefits programs, such as salaries, bonuses, and insurance.
Compliance: ensuring compliance with federal and state employment laws and regulations.
Policy development and administration: creating, updating, and communicating HR policies and procedures.
Employee records management: maintaining accurate and up-to-date employee files and records.
Diversity and inclusion: promoting and fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace culture.
Other HR-related tasks as assigned by management.
Qualifications:
Strong knowledge of federal and state employment laws and regulations.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with employees at all levels of the organization.
Good organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively.
Experience with HR information systems (HRIS) and other HR technology solutions.
Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive employee information.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and resolve HR-related issues.

Job Description:
1. Develop the visual UX concept for product and services, and structure and visualize it for users.
2. Offer a new experience and sensation to users with the developed visual US concept.
Role and Responsibilities
1. [Research & analysis] Perform research and analysis on the projects/ products requirements, functionalities, market, trend, users, etc.
2. [Visual UX concept design] Define and design the visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles for product usability based on the analysis outcome.
3. [Commercialization design] Develop detailed scenarios based on the derived visual UX (User Experience) concept and GUI (Graphical User Interface) principles and design/ draft product development outputs (e.g. GUI guideline, motion design, etc.).
4. [Validation] Perform internal validation, such as PR (Rapid Prototyping), and incorporate external validation results into the final output so improvements can be made.

Job Description:
Graphic Designer If you are interested to be part of a dynamic social startup that works towards serving the common good and will not just change India for the better but also make giving back more inclusive and fun, then Impact Guru is the right place for you. We are looking for a Graphic Designer to assist in the development of our various fundraisers and campaigns. He or she will create energetic and badass graphic assets for web (and sometimes print), bring new ideas to the team, and always act as a brand defender, and keeper of a consistent visual design language. The role is a fulltime role based out of our Mumbai office where the candidate is expected to let his/ her creative juices flow by providing promising design solutions for our visual content.

Job Responsibilities:

Design clear engaging graphic communications for web, mobile, and print - this includes direct mail pieces, brand promotional items, website and social media graphics, posters, flyers, and other marketing materials

Work closely with marketing and content team to translate their messaging concepts into graphic/ visual marketing material

Think creatively and independently design concepts, graphics, and layouts

Grow online social networks by acquiring new fan- base and increasing interactions via designs

Knowledge of and ability to use various design tools

Excellent interpersonal and presentation skills

Ensure consistent branding across all communication channels Requirements:

A Bachelor s degree in Fine Arts or Graphic Design,

Prior work experience in graphic design,

Creative self- starter who is comfortable with both taking initiative and working in collaboration,

Proficient in Adobe InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Premier Pro and/ or other common design and layout applications,

Must have excellent time management skills,

Detail oriented with strong written and verbal communication skills,

Must have ability to work independently as well as in partnership with team,

Creative, witty & spontaneous. Perquisites & Benefits:

Opportunity to be part of a diverse working environment, valuable social sector work experience,

Fun, casual, relaxed and flexible work environment,

Flexible working hours. Email your CV with the subject line "Graphic Designer" to careers@impactguru.com
Keywords: Graphics, Graphic designing, Illustrator, Time management, Social media, Tool design, Photoshop, Adobe, Fine arts, Visual Design

Templatic is one of the most popular, pioneer in WordPress themes since 10+ years catering hundreds of thousands of customers worldwide. We have a portfolio of app-like WordPress themes and plugin used on thousands of websites. Currently, we are looking to extend our team and are looking for:

A great web designer
Our ideal candidate is an awesome UI/ UX wizard that can not only create awesome themes, wireframes, and graphics but code it into a responsive website template (coding part is optional). You will be a passionate, talented, and creative person that is looking to share in our mission of delivering user-friendly WordPress themes and plugin UI that deliver exceptional results for those we serve. You will have at least 2 years of experience in website and UX/UI design.

Qualifications
Attention to detail and desire to achieve pixel perfection in everything you do.
Experience in designing website templates, WordPress themes or templates for other platforms.
A strong working knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap. (optional if applying as a designer)
Strong desire to create modern themes that set a new standard.
Interest about the latest design trends.
Able to work with limited to no guidelines.
What You Can Expect
Competitive salary, growth and opportunity.
Chance to work on website templates that will be used by customers worldwide.
A company that has its own product and is not subject to outside contracts.
An environment where everyone s ideas are heard, valued, and are important.
The chance to show off your skills to make our company grow across the world.
An opportunity to advance your career while maintaining a work-life balance.
A total commitment to put your energy and passion into your work every day
Be creative and innovative in evolving our company to the next level
Use independent critical thinking and communication skills to advance your work
Create amazing ideas that push the boundaries of what is possible in our market
Be an online and offline company advocate to enhance our community standing

Job Description:
Responsible for creating the visual layout and design of student books, workbooks, worksheet resources (working with International publishers, predominantly in the areas of ELL/ELT/Education) using Adobe InDesign on both Mac and Windows.
Work closely with authors, editors, and publishers to develop a design that enhances the books content and appeals to the target market.
Key responsibilities:
Developing or implementing a design concept: Create a design concept or implement the client-given design concept that captures the essence of the book and appeals to the target market. This includes selecting fonts, colors, ensuring how best the content could fit in the page without compromising on the design, and also keep in mind other design elements that convey the desired mood and tone. The concept will also need to match the clients instructions and briefing, as necessary.
Creating a layout: Create a layout that organizes the text and illustrations in an appealing and readable way as per publisher specifications. This includes using the appropriate page size and margins, determining the placement of headers, footers, and page numbers, and deciding on the placement of illustrations and other visual elements.
Preparing files for print: Preparing the files for print by ensuring that they meet the printers specifications and are free from errors or inconsistencies.
Staying up-to-date with design trends: A book designer must stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and technologies and must be able to incorporate new techniques and tools into their work.
Communication skills: Must possess a strong aesthetic sense, communication skills, and a keen attention to detail. They must be able to collaborate effectively with editors and publishers, and the rest of the design team. They should also be able to work within tight deadlines and budgets.
Knowledge of Photoshop and Illustrator will be an added advantage
Keywords: Printing, Publishing, Illustrator, Social media, Appeals, Windows, Photoshop, Adobe

Job Description:
1. Conceptualisation and Design: Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualise and design static visuals that align with project objectives and client needs. Create captivating and aesthetically pleasing designs, including but not limited to graphics, illustrations, logos, and marketing materials.
2. Graphic Design: Develop and design marketing collateral, such as brochures, flyers, posters, and banners. Design digital assets for websites, social media, and email marketing campaigns.
3. Branding and Identity: Assist in the development and maintenance of brand identity guidelines, ensuring consistent application across all materials.
4. Quality Control: Review and refine designs to ensure they meet our high standards for visual excellence and brand consistency.
5. Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure that design concepts align with project goals and objectives.
6. Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with design trends, tools, and technologies to bring fresh and innovative ideas to the table.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a static designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your design work.Proficiency in industry-standard design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.Strong attention to detail, with a keen eye for aesthetics and visual composition.Creativity and the ability to generate unique design concepts.Effective communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively.Time management skills to meet project deadlines.Knowledge of branding principles and design for marketing and advertising is a plus.Join us in the world of design, where your talent and creativity will be celebrated.

Job Description:
As a Designer at IFF, you will be responsible for evaluating and applying Flavors / Ingredients (Stabilizers / Emulsifiers / Protein / fibers etc.) in food applications for Dairy beverage applications which includes Milk, Flavoured Milk, Milkshake, Fermented Milks Lassi, Laban, Buttermilk, Smoothies, Dairy Cooking Cream, Non-Dairy Whip Toppings, Cheeses and selecting the optimal Flavors / Ingredients for customer projects in the part of Africa Middle East/Turkey & India - AMETI region.

How You Will Contribute
Design
Establish knowledge of recipe ingredients, raw materials, and their function.
Basic knowledge about functional ingredients like hydrocolloids/stabilizers, emulsifiers, dietary fibers, sweeteners, dairy & plant proteins, preservatives, colors, additives etc.
Know the production process.
Develop and improve Portfolio using knowledge of industry standards, country specific and client requirements, and requirements of the business.
Hands on experience of running dairy pilot plant including UHT machines, batch pasteurizers, homogenizers, silvers ion mixer, ice cream freezers, analytic equipment s, viscometer, Ph meter, moisture analyzer, rheometer etc.
Innovation/New Technology
Participate in category initiatives and new concept generation.
Have good technical know-how knowledge of dairy production/processing i.e., UHT Dairy beverage, fermented dairy drink i.e., butter milk, lassi, yogurt, nondairy cooking cream, whipping cream, ice cream etc.
Promote solutions to maximize flavor and technology performance.
Deep knowledge of dairy production & processing challenges in plant, product handling, key product parameters, manpower handling, packaging norms, product standardization etc.
Advocate appropriate technology use throughout application team on appropriate projects.
Project Management
Build awareness of operations within given project parameters: GRA, CIU, IFF IT Systems, etc.
Exposure to and awareness of GRA, legislation restrictions and impact on projects.
Good understanding of market trends, dairy overview in regions, product acceptance behavior in different territories etc.
Networking, Strategy & Business Knowledge
Build relationships with other functions and customers.
Build regional cross-functional networking.
Good understanding of B2B business, customer travels, training skills, soft spoken, internal relation development with sales, innovation colleagues & other stakeholders.
Leadership
Share knowledge with the team and provide guidance to Associate Portfolio Designers and members of the C&D community.
Inspire and build confidence in others to achieve targets. Basic Criteria.
Good business knowledge, excellent communication skills, market knowledge, future prospective thought process, new concepts development will be an extra advantage.


Job Requirements
What you will need to be successful
Bachelor s degree in Dairy Science or Dairy Technology or Food Technology.
Atleast 7-10 years of relevant work experience.
Good knowledge and understanding of most food applications, ingredients, and processes with practical experience in Customers food manufacturing environment.
Excellent project management skills and able to manage complex development projects and briefs.
Expert technical problem-solving skills in specific applications and basic skills in multiple applications areas.
Ability to translate market trends into innovative products for key Customers.
Strong oral and written proficiency in the English language.
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
Team-focused work style.
Keywords: Basic, Project development, Interpersonal skills, Networking, Nutrition, Food technology, Diversity and Inclusion, Project management, Packaging, Analytics

Job Description:
We aim to transform the way people see and experience the world by building eyewear experiences for everyone and every purpose. We re building Lenskart as a fashion destination for eyewear and are passionate about creating a consumer brand which delivers breakthrough eyewear products and experiences. Coordinate with the product & merchandising team for sample and final product development.
Assist in creating collection design briefs for brand & consumer experience teams.
Maintain a design library for all concepts, sketches & technical drawings as per collection/season/categories for all product brands.
Maintain all physical samples/chips/hardware for core & trend-setting styles.
Qualifications :
5 - 8 years of experience in fashion & lifestyle product design / industrial design / CMF design
B.des or M.des in Fashion / Product / Accessory design from NIFT, NID & other premier design institutes
Software skills: Rhino, Blender, Keyshot Pro, Adobe Illustrator & Adobe Photoshop

Job Description:
As an Intimatewear designer, youre expected to conceptualise and design best-in-class products for our brands in their geographies. Your keen eye for detail, strong technical skills in garment construction & design, and the ability to stay on top of consumer preferences will help us keep our client s catalogues relevant and trendy. You will directly be reporting to the Principal Designer

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
Actively participate in market study to identify current trends, fabrics, and techniques, and seeking design inspiration
Deeply understand /define brand and customer profiling to address the relevant market opportunities with relevant concepts
Develop ideas for product re-engineering
Interpret seasonal fashion directions, opportunities and assort merchandise / range to stay ahead of competition
Conceptualize, design and develop the range in line with brand ethos/positioning, as per pricing/margin strategy and learnings from the previous seasons within acceptable timelines
Liaise with product development/fit technicians for relevant inputs (vendors/mills) to get planned innovations on fits, fabric, style, print techniques, surface enhancements/textures, trims etc.
Participate in concept and range approval discussion
Liaise with product development for sampling, tech pack handover and prototyping
Prepare mood boards for the forthcoming season
Create line sheets and design packs as per agreed range
Participate in fit sessions, PP approvals to ensure quality of product
Support GTM presentation by ensuring 100% accuracy of information and sample availability
Ensure FABs are procured as per given specs
Identify opportunities for bringing in process efficiency

QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS:
3+ years of industry experience of designing garments in category like lingerie, for top global brands (like M&S, Amante, Nike, Puma)
Post graduation/graduation in fashion/apparel design and merchandising (or a related discipline) from top colleges like NIFT, NID or equivalent
A keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and strong technical skills in garment construction and design
Proficiency in working with one or many of the prevalent design tools like Adobe Illustrator, or Adobe Photoshop. Previous experience of working with 3D design tools like 3D CAD or CLO 3D will be a big plus
Strong understanding of cross-functional team accountabilities and requirements; including close working relationships with product development, raw material, quality assurance, garment technology and merchandising teams
Extensive and excellent knowledge in the production process, fit, fabrics, garment construction, manufacturing and costing

BENEFITS:
A competitive salary - We want our early employees to think like entrepreneurs & grow fast. If you do well, your wealth creation is on us.
Comprehensive health benefits for you and your family.
Relocation support and reimbursements, if you are changing cities.
Healthy meal plans and a stocked pantry at the office.
Direct mentorship and guidance from seasoned industry leaders
Keywords: Supply chain, Construction, Costing, Manager Quality Assurance, Illustrator, Tool design, Raw material, garment technology, Photoshop, 3d cad

Who we are
We are an innovation company, passionate about our work and convinced about creating a better world by design. As a Graphics Designer Intern, you will have the opportunity to gain practical experience in the field of graphic design. Working closely with our creative team, you will be involved in the conceptualization, design, and production of various visual materials for our organization. This internship offers a valuable learning environment for individuals interested in enhancing their graphic design skills and building a strong portfolio.

Key Responsibilities:
Graphic Design: Assist in the creation of graphics for various platforms, including digital media, social media, print, presentations, and promotional materials.
Concept Development: Collaborate with the creative team to develop design concepts that align with project objectives and brand guidelines.
Visual Branding: Help maintain and strengthen the organizations visual identity by adhering to brand guidelines and consistently using brand elements in design work.
Layout and Composition: Design visually appealing layouts and compositions for marketing materials, ensuring a seamless balance of text and imagery.

Print Production: Prepare print-ready designs and collaborate with print vendors for production and quality control.
Feedback Incorporation: Actively participate in design critiques and incorporate feedback from the creative team to improve design quality.
Time Management: Manage multiple design projects and meet deadlines effectively.
Research and Learning: Stay updated with design trends, techniques, and software to contribute innovative ideas and solutions.

Job Description:
Samsung Design Delhi is looking for a potential candidate who has an expertise in driving the UX Research & Strategy role
We are looking for people who have 2+ years of experience in formulating, conducting & synthesizing primary & secondary user experience research with the best practiced tools, frameworks & protocols, contextual to the scope of work
A candidate that can leverage the insights generated from the core research & draw strategical narratives & presentations through new & enhanced opportunities for Samsung & its digital experiences
The core tasks will also include the transition of insights to high fidelity UX design concepts & directions: Derive UX (User Experience) insights, concepts and solutions for forming a meaningful relationship between users and product/ services to offer the best user valued experience aligned to the Samsung roadmap
Design IA (Information Architecture) and Workflow of products and services
Role and Responsibilities
Necessary Skills / Attributes

[Research & Analysis]
Planning & development of research protocols and implementation, analysis methodology and tools related to each project brief. Consideration of market drivers, industry lead trends & forecast in the digital experience domains that can impact the research directly.

[UX concept design]
Define and work on UX (User Experience) core principles and concepts for UI (User Interface) design using derived insights and analysis that provides meaningful values to target users and the brand.

[Commercialization design]
Manage and oversee to ensure that commercialize output IA (Information Architecture), workflow, and layout are materialized within the given timeline. Carry out detailed scenarios for the UX core principles and concept. [Validation] Perform self-validation such as RP (Rapid Prototyping) or external validation, and incorporate the validation outcome to the final output for improvement.

[Design Strategy & Presentation]
Create design strategies & impactful presentations to share the consumable insights & opportunities to the stakeholders across Samsung.
Skills and Qualifications
Learns to use professional concepts. Applies company policies and procedures to resolve routine issues
Works on problems of limited scope. Follows standard practices and procedures
Normally receives detailed instructions on all work
Typical entry point for university graduates
Keywords: Usage, Concept design, User interface designing, Relationship, Transition, Workflow, Research, Research analysis, Forecasting, Information architecture

About upGrowth:

At upGrowth, we help identify the critical success components of the online business, figure out the target market; chalk out a go-to market strategy. Essentially, help put together the nuts and bolts of an idea. We are a bunch of passionate folks that have worked with iconic brands like Google, Times Internet, and Digital Vidya. We scale up users from 0 to 10 s of millions and generate leads. Our team effort results in exponential growth with our Growth Hacking, Digital Marketing, and IT Solutions.
About Internship:
The selected intern s day-to-day responsibilities include:
Come up with new innovative ideas for videos for different industries and clients
Work closely with the upGrowth team and clients, make the videos and edit them as per requirement
What would an intern learn in this internship
Other than developing a thorough understanding of social media marketing and the digital marketing industry, you will get first-hand experience of working in the industry and designing ways to grow a brand; this internship will also teach you how to use videos in digital marketing and growth hacking.
You will also learn a lot about how a business works. As this is a remote job, we are looking for a profile of graphic design intern who can blend in with our team.
Skill(s) required: Video Editing and Video Making
Only those candidates can apply who:
Are available for the part-time job/internship
Are available for the duration of 3 months
Are from Pune and neighboring cities
Have relevant skills and interests
