Job Description:
As a UI/UX Designer Intern, your role will involve working closely with the design and product teams to assist in various aspects of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design. Here are the typical roles and responsibilities you might have as a UI/UX Designer Intern:
User Research: Participate in user research activities, such as surveys, interviews, and usability testing. Gather insights about user needs, behaviors, and preferences to inform design decisions.
Wireframing and Prototyping: Create low-fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the user journey and interface flow. These prototypes help communicate design ideas and gather feedback from stakeholders.
Visual Design: Assist in creating visually appealing and consistent user interfaces. Contribute to the selection of color schemes, typography, icons, and other visual elements that align with the brand and enhance the user experience.
Usability Testing: Collaborate with the team to conduct usability tests on prototypes or existing interfaces. Help analyze the results to identify areas for improvement in terms of usability and user satisfaction.
Information Architecture: Assist in organizing and structuring information within the app or website. Contribute to creating intuitive navigation menus, sitemaps, and content hierarchies.
Interaction Design: Contribute to defining and designing user interactions, animations, and micro-interactions that enhance the overall user experience.
User-Centered Design: Work with empathy to ensure that the designs are user-centered, addressing user pain points and providing solutions that cater to their needs.
Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and other designers. Participate in design reviews and brainstorming sessions to refine ideas and concepts.
Adaptation and Iteration: Be open to feedback and iteration. Revise designs based on feedback from team members and stakeholders, and continuously improve the designs based on user testing results.
Responsive Design: Contribute to designing interfaces that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes, ensuring a consistent and enjoyable experience for users.
Documentation: Assist in creating design documentation, style guides, and design specifications that provide guidelines for the development team to implement your designs accurately.
Learning and Skill Development: Utilize the internship as an opportunity to learn and improve your design skills. Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in UI/UX design.
Tools Mastery: Familiarize yourself with design tools like Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or others commonly used in the industry. Gain proficiency in these tools to efficiently create and collaborate on design projects.
Feedback Incorporation: Actively participate in design critiques and feedback sessions, both giving and receiving constructive input to improve your design skills.
Ethical Considerations: Be aware of ethical considerations related to user data privacy, accessibility, and inclusivity in your designs.
Keywords: User research, Intern, Interaction design, Tool design, data privacy, Adobe, Internship, Usability testing, Testing, Visual Design

Job Title: Graphic Designer (Web, Branding, Print, and Presentation)
Job Description:
As a Graphic Designer at Greenstrand Pvt Ltd, you will be responsible for creating stunning visual content across various mediums, including web, branding, print, and presentations. You will work closely with our marketing and communications teams to bring our brand to life, ensuring that our design elements are not only aesthetically appealing but also aligned with our values of sustainability.
Key Responsibilities:
Web Design: Create and maintain visually appealing and user-friendly websites that reflect our brand identity.
Branding: Develop and maintain a consistent brand identity across all marketing materials and touchpoints.
Print Design: Design various print materials, such as brochures, flyers, and banners, adhering to the brand guidelines.
Presentation Design: Develop engaging and compelling presentations for internal and external use.
Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing and communications teams to understand project requirements and objectives.
Requirements:
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills in web design, branding, print, and presentations.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and experience with web design tools.
Knowledge of current design trends, web design principles, and branding guidelines.
Strong communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
A passion for sustainability and the ability to infuse eco-friendly elements into design projects.
Benefits:
Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
Health, dental, and vision insurance.
Opportunities for professional development and training.
A supportive and innovative work environment.
Contribution to a greener and more sustainable world.
How to Apply:
If you are excited about the prospect of combining your design talents with a company dedicated to sustainability and innovation, please send your resume and a link to your portfolio to [your contact email] with the subject line "Graphic Designer Application - Greenstrand Pvt Ltd."
Greenstrand Pvt Ltd is an equal opportunity employer, and we encourage candidates of all backgrounds to apply.
Join us in making a positive impact through design, and let your creativity thrive while contributing to a more sustainable future!

Job Title: Design Engineer (LTP) - Steam Turbine Service Engineering
Job Description:
Engineering support for the preparation of technical documentation of steam turbine outages for the installed fleet worldwide. This includes analysing global fleet experience, technical instructions, and recommendations.
Review unit-specific Product Change Management (PCM) data, record action points, and incorporate them into future outage plans.
Coordinating and consulting with Subject Matter Experts globally to compile OEM fleet experiences and specific recommendations for inclusion in unit-specific outage plans.
Support field service team with technical clarifications and relevant documentation during scheduled steam turbine maintenance, including periodic inspections and forced outages.
Effectively support unit data management and data upgrade/revision in engineering databases.
We don't need superheroes, just super minds:
Bachelors/ Masters degree in engineering or related technical field from a reputed institute.
5 to 8 years of experience in engineering support to Steam Turbine outages and maintenance.
Familiarity of power plants and general understanding of steam turbines, valves, bearings, associated components like condenser, seal steam system, lube oil system, drain system and other auxiliaries.
General understanding of scheduled steam turbine maintenance, including periodic inspections like minor, medium and major outages is considered an added advantage.
Experience with SAP, Teamcenter or other data management systems.
Effective communication skills (verbal, written and listening), a strong sense of teamwork and customer focus.
Ability to work independently with minimal guidance is essential.
Ability to interface directly with customer, field, factory personnel and management.
Ability to make quick, informed decisions on a regular basis.
Ability to manage multiple field issues / projects and meet deadlines.
Keywords: Steam turbine, Change management, SAP, Data management, Consulting, Service engineering, Valves, PCM, Management, Technical documentation

Job Description:
As a CC Design Engineer, you will be responsible for activities contributing to the design and development of products, solutions, and systems
Includes activities linked to technical improvement of existing products and components
Positions requiring an understanding of concepts, methods, and procedures (technical bachelor s degree)
Lead requisition jobs of Flange-to-Flange Centrifugal compressors for Turbomachinery products working with internal & Global stakeholders

As a CC Design Engineer, you will be responsible for:
Understanding customer requirements and design details for a project and preparing detailed calculations on machine selection, Rotor dynamics, thermodynamics, Performance calculations & followed by mechanical design of 2D cross-section of the machine on NX in line with our policies and standards.
Working closely with all stake holders to understand the design details and finalize to have a standard machine to reduce cycle time
Having strong basic mechanical Knowledge of Thermal , Materials, Geometric Dimension & Tolerance (GD&T) awareness, capability to perform hand calculations
Reviewing the raw & machining drawings and releasing them in Team Center PLM.
Releasing Engineering docs in the VDR domain to customers and other stakeholders as per requirements
Working closely with counterparts and leadership to provide necessary support & quality deliverables to Customers in the VDR domain.
Working on priority to meet the metrics of on-time delivery / Quality / Productivity. Work closely with suppliers in advance to meet the metrics.
Developing automation abilities using digital tools and methods in order to produce faster and better outputs

Fuel your passion
To be successful in this role you will:
Have BE/BTech OR ME/MTech in Mechanical/Turbomachinery Engineering with a minimum of 0 to 10 years of designing experience in turbomachinery products and systems.
Have hands-on experience in Thermodynamic & Rotor-dynamics calculation for Turbomachinery products
Have experience in Oil & Gas Domain working closely with customers.
Have experience in Compressor, Expander design knowledge with experience resolving customer issues
Have a technical background in centrifugal compressors oriented toward the understanding of the P&I structure/base logic system.
Be able to bring new improvements in process, design & Cycle time reduction to be compliant with quality & business requirements.
Have engineering effort knowledge to evaluate/manage standard requirements (when needed)
Have well committed to the target i.e., critical issue/workload pick to be managed in a very short time
Have expertise in Tools: UG Nx and Team Center.
Keywords: Process design, PLM, Cycle time reduction, Thermodynamics, Automation, Finance, Mechanical, Quality engineering, thermal, Mechanical design

Job Description:
About Nobroker-

NoBroker is Indias FIRST and ONLY PropTech Unicorn with a disruptive tech-based, capital-efficient business model. We use technology in the real-estate space to help customers buy/sell/rent a property seamlessly by eliminating third-party(Brokers) involvement and brokerage. We assist our stakeholders in reducing 90% of transaction cost by connecting property owners and tenants, buyers and sellers directly with the help of AI-driven technology. Our mission is to make real estate transactions streamlined, convenient and brokerage-free for everyone across India.

With cumulative 1.5 crore customers, it has grown 10X in last two years. With five rounds of funding of $361 mn, it is well funded by key US, Indian, Japanese and Korean investors like Tiger Global, General Atlantic, SAIF Partners, Moore Strategic Ventures; KTB ventures and BeeNext. It is headquartered in Bangalore with a team of 5,000+ people.

Job description -
Role Responsibilities Interact with customers to understand their design requirements in detail. Work closely with the sales team to convert potential leads to happy customers.  Be in-charge of the customer s project from start to finish, which includes preparing 2D-3D designs, presentations, BOQ and quotes, getting the material selection done with customers.  Provide appropriate design consultation and inform customers about the processes & terms followed at NoBroker. Understanding of costing for modular furniture and ability to read & understand production drawings, BOQs & Cut lists etc.  Excellent communication and presentation skills.

Job Title: Founding Member & Senior Product Designer - UX/UI
Job Description: #NAME?

Job Description:
As a Senior UI/UX Visual Designer with unique problem-solving and a deep passion for quality, you have the talent to help us design the next generation of FitFyles and bring our five-star Web and Mobile Apps to tens of millions of users each month. If this sounds like you, please read on!



Who You Are

You believe the experience is everything
You know how to use a strong process to create the best for people
You possess a relentless desire to innovate
You pay an unwavering attention to detail
You don?t think good enough is ever enough
You think art and beauty are completely compatible with a great sense of humor
You like having your hands in every aspect of a product?s design
You breathe simplicity and intuition into the design of everything you touch
You adore developers and like holding their hands
You?re a crack amateur psychologist
You surprise and delight with your designs
You could spend all day in SFMOMA, the California Academy of Sciences, or exploring street art
You know how to use em dashes appropriately
You know that crafting error messages and designing edge cases represents how much you really care
You use your dream state to help flesh out your product?s stories
Your right brains and left brains are equally developed



What You Want From Your Next Career Move

To help people live longer, healthier, and happier lives, bringing simplicity and clarity to health information and connections, and encouraging healthy engagement through compelling design.



Why We Need You

FitFyles is out to change the world?one person at a time. As a Visual Designer at FitFyles, your designs will be seen by and make a difference in the lives of millions of people. They?ll even help save lives. You?ll bring simplicity and clarity to health information and connections, and encourage health engagement through compelling design. You?ll work closely with Engineers and Product Managers to create designs that are simple but engaging and simple for the user, focusing on creating intuitive interactions and compelling, pleasing visual designs. Responsibilities include:

Define and build the revolutionary applications that actually help save lives
Bring simplicity, clarity, and ease of use to health ? a field filled with complexity, confusion, and uncertainty
Design novel visual interfaces, user flows, and compelling interactions, and develop, communicate, and implement the best-in-class user experience and associated UI framework on a range of products
Develop, communicate, and implement the best-in-class user experience and associated UI framework on a range of products
Advocate responsibly and effectively for users in a fast-paced startup environment, imparting day-to-day design leadership that fosters a shared understanding of the user-centric intersection between design, content, business, and engineering
Manage UX research and testing processes to drive the development and communication of design guidelines, patterns, and libraries that will be used to make a difference, and track and analyze metrics to inform design/UX optimization efforts
Oversee close coordination with the product management team to develop a shared vision of exceptional user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and final graphics



How You?ll invert the Healthcare Model

To help people live better, healthier, and happier lives, bringing simplicity and clarity to health information history and encouraging healthy engagement through compelling design.



What You?ve Achieved

BA/BS or graduate degree from a top school or program, with an exceptional academic record (design or related degree preferred)
Professional background as an interactive / UX designer in mass-market web and mobile products
Strong user experience skill set including strategy, information architecture, design aesthetic, and usability testing
A compelling and engaging portfolio that demonstrates out-of-the box thinking, clean design principles, and exceptional user flows and experiences
Proven understanding of interaction design concepts and a unique sense of design principles
Expert skill level in Photoshop and Illustrator
Mobile-first approaches into your daily workflow (preferred)
Intimate understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript (preferred)
Keywords: Product management, Graphics, Business Analyst, UI, Illustrator, Interaction design, Javascript, Healthcare, Workflow, Photoshop

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly creative and motivated Graphic Designer to join our growing team. As a Graphic Designer, your role will involve conceptualizing and creating visually appealing designs and layouts for a variety of digital and print mediums. Your work will contribute to building our brand image, promoting products and services, and enhancing overall user experience. The ideal candidate should possess exceptional design skills, a strong eye for detail, and the ability to work collaboratively within a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project objectives and creatively translate them into appealing design concepts.
- Develop and maintain a consistent brand identity across various marketing materials, including brochures, advertisements, social media graphics, presentations, and website content.
- Create and manage visually captivating digital assets, such as banners, icons, and infographics, that align with current design trends and best practices.
- Produce high-quality print materials, including flyers, posters, packaging, and promotional items, ensuring they are delivered on time and within specified guidelines.
- Conduct thorough research to stay updated on industry trends, competitor designs, and emerging technologies to continuously improve design skills and keep the company at the forefront of design innovation.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, HR and sales, to understand requirements and effectively translate them into visually appealing design solutions.
- Present design concepts to stakeholders, incorporating feedback and making revisions to ensure that the final output reflects the companys vision and goals.
- Optimize graphics for a variety of digital platforms, including websites, social media, and email marketing campaigns, ensuring visual consistency and maximum reach.
Requirements:
- Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
- 0-1 year experience as a Graphic Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio demonstrating a range of design work across various mediums.
- Proficiency in industry-standard design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign).
- In-depth knowledge of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout principles.
- Strong understanding of current design trends, user experience, and best practices for both digital and print design.
- Ability to work efficiently on multiple projects simultaneously, with excellent time management and organizational skills.
- Strong communication and presentation skills to effectively collaborate with various stakeholders and present design concepts and ideas.
- Attention to detail, with the ability to maintain a high level of accuracy and consistency.
- Solid understanding of branding and the ability to incorporate and maintain brand guidelines in all design work.
- Proactive attitude towards creative problem-solving and willingness to embrace constructive feedback.
- Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
Preferred Qualifications:
- Basic Knowledge/Experience in creating motion graphics and video editing.
- Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and web design principles.
- Familiarity with UX/UI design and knowledge of user-centered design principles.
Keywords: Graphics, Printing, Email marketing, Illustrator, adobe creative suite, Social media, Packaging, Video editing, HTML, Photoshop

Job Description:
Join Us in Crafting Creativity: Design Internship at Mockingbird Studios Pvt. Ltd.
Are you a budding design virtuoso with a passion for visual storytelling? Do you dream of leaving
your artistic mark on brands? Look no further Mockingbird Studios Pvt. Ltd. invites you to embark
on a design adventure that could shape your career!
Who We Are:
With over 11 years of trailblazing in the Wall Graphics industry, Mockingbird Studios Pvt. Ltd. is
primed for a dazzling rebrand. As we soar into this exciting chapter, we're on the hunt for a dynamic
Design Intern to be the co-author of our fresh narrative.
What You'll Do:
As the Design Intern, you'll dive headfirst into our brand's rejuvenation. You'll be the Picasso behind
our marketing materials, breathing life into social media posts, brochures, presentations, emailers,
and more. Your canvas will be a brand on the verge of a remarkable transformation.
What's in It for You:
This isn't just an internship; it's a trampoline into a potential full-time role. As a member of our
creative symphony, you'll have a front-row seat to shaping a new identity. Your artistic prowess will
be a key ingredient in our recipe for success.
Who We're Seeking:
Our ideal collaborator is located between Malad and Vasai, ready to weave their magic within our
vibrant team. If you're captivated by the idea of being a permanent fixture in our journey after the
internship, we're all ears!
Qualifications:
- A flair for design that's evident in your portfolio.
- Proficiency in design tools and software (Adobe Creative Suite, etc.).
- Impeccable attention to detail no pixel escapes your discerning eye.
- A proactive approach to learning and adapting to new challenges.
- A sprinkle of creativity, a dash of innovation, and a whole lot of enthusiasm.




Perks of the Gig:
- A stipend of INR 10,000 during the internship period.
- The internship period will be of 2 months.
- After internship period the pay will be between 15k to 20k
- A 5-day work week that ensures your artistic well never runs dry.
- A 360-degree immersion in a youthful, dynamic, and fun-loving workspace.
- The potential to turn this internship into a golden ticket for a full-time role.
- The chance to contribute to a brand's metamorphosis in a meaningful way.
Application Instructions:
If you're ready to dive into this artistic escapade and potentially make Mockingbird Studios Pvt. Ltd.
your creative nest, send us your compelling portfolio and a curated cover letter detailing your
motivation, experience, and aspirations. Drop these masterpieces at [email address] with the subject
line: "Design Intern Extraordinaire."
Join us if you're not just looking for an internship, but an artistic expedition that promises to redefine
the world of Wall Graphics!
*Note: Please note that we're only considering candidates keen on pursuing a full-time role after the
internship. Creativity and camaraderie are our core tenets.*
Keywords: Illustartor, Visualiser, Corel Draw, Graphic Designing, Photoshop, Indesign

Job Description:
We are currently seeking capable Web Designer with solid Graphics Designing skills to produce web page outlines and code landing pages and to manage content of website.
Candidate profile:
Ideal candidate must have more than a year of professional experience as a Frontend Web Designer, with a portfolio that demonstrates a solid understanding of current web standards, modern design principles, and frontend development capabilities.
Design work experience on enhancement of visual appeal, while staying within brand guidelines yet modern, responsive websites with thoughtful content architecture and navigation.
The ability to adapt designing style according to customer requirement.
Knowledge of graphic design for print is plus.
A detail-oriented developer who understand the importance of consistency in design, and who strives to reach a perfect balance of form and function are qualities we greatly value.
Must have proficiency with Microsoft Office and other common applications.
Self-motivated and self-disciplined when it comes to meeting deadlines in an autonomous working environment.
Active member of regular team meetings and collaborate often with other team members.
Advanced knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, with expertise in Photoshop for creating web design mockups, material design/color concepts and compressing images for web browsers.
Experience with Adobe Illustrator and InDesign for creating and editing vector artwork, print collateral, and editorial designs.
Thorough understanding of HTML5 and CSS3, and ability to hand-code semantic frontend web pages to current web standards.
Understanding of JavaScript/jQuery principles and implementation. Advanced knowledge and direct JavaScript development skills are a plus.
Grid-based framework coding experience (Bootstrap expertise or experience are a plus).
Experience with CRM applications for creating landing pages and email template design.
Thorough understanding of responsive web design principles.
Icon Design Graphics Design and knowledge in Material Design Colour concepts.
Excellent skills in Modern Responsive Design and must have Basic Backend knowledge
Knowledge of SEO principles and ability to apply them effectively to web pages.
Videography and video editing skills
Responsibilities:
As a Frontend Designer, you are adept at creating eye catchy web page layouts and producing the clean, semantic HTML/CSS/JavaScript code necessary to bring those designs to life.
Design forward-thinking mockups of landing pages and various other web pages, while maintaining our corporate brand.
Develop mockups into functional web pages and implement.
Design and development streamlined web page templates intended for re-use.
Update and manage landing page content, as needed. Make quick edits whenever applicable.
Design and develop/code marketing email templates and integrate into our mailing list application.
Design graphics and print-ready collateral to support marketing campaigns and our client events, including YouTube covers, flyers, brochures, and more.
Understanding of form processes, and proficiency in creating web forms and auto-responders.
Track and document your work, tasks, and progress within our collaboration application.
Clean, organized coding habits with intuitive formatting and correct syntax.
Ability to create organized and intuitive file and directory structuring and file naming, and ability to adhere to existing structures.
Organization of assigned project within project management system.
Create and maintain artwork, designing, templet database.
Keywords: Graphics, jQuery, Coding, Project management, Javascript, HTML, SEO, Photoshop, CRM, CSS3

The successful candidate will be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts. They will be able to transform them into beautiful, intuitive, and functional designs.

Proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript for rapid prototyping.

3+ years of experience in web designing
Demonstrable graphic design skills with a strong portfolio
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
Experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, site maps and landing pages.
Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction.
Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively
Up-to-date with the latest Web trends, techniques and technologies

Job Description:
Job Description

We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team at Salam Kisan. As a Graphic Designer, you will play a crucial role in crafting visually compelling content that communicates our brand's message and values. Your expertise in design tools like Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and Canva will be instrumental in creating impactful designs that resonate with our audience.

Responsibilities
Collaborate with the marketing and communication teams to conceptualize and design visual assets for a wide range of digital and print materials.

Stay updated with industry trends, design tools, and emerging technologies to bring innovative ideas to the table.

Creative mindset with the ability to conceptualize and convey ideas visually.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with agricultural and rural themes is a plus but not mandatory.

Job Description:
What are we looking for?
We are looking for a young graphic designer who wants to work in the premium and luxury space. As with any good design role, there are no set rules or boundaries that you are limited to at Smytten. For greater clarity, you can find some of the responsibilities that you'll have.

Job Description
Job: Graphic Designer
Job Type: Full-Time
Location: Ahmedabad, Gujarat
Designation: Associate

Roles & Responsibilities
Content covers - On Smytten, every article comes with its own stunning magazine cover. So you'll be spending a lot of your time designing luxury covers for a myriad of topics in the premium and luxury space.

Digital Design - eMail designs, social media posts, website landing pages, in-app assets, blog posts, and anything else that you believe will further the brand in the digital space.

Offline design - Being a startup, there will also be an ad-hoc need for offline design properties for events, fairs, etc. We'd love someone who can visualize the brand presence offline with a great design application.

Copy - We'd prefer it if you are adept at English, love reading, and have a standpoint on what
constitutes good copy.

Other responsibilities: Packaging design, video editing, and illustrating.

Skills

We're looking for someone who believes that good design is paramount in building a great brand.

If you're young, enthusiastic, love reading, and have a great design standpoint that you can apply to your work, this job is for you.

Brownie points for the following:
Excellent graphic design skills with a strong portfolio.
Creative flair, versatility, conceptual/visual ability, and originality.
Strong interaction, communication, and presentation skills.
Good practical experience with industry-leading software and technologies, such as
Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Coral Draw, In Design, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, and so on. Strong
abilities to comply with requirements of time, costs, and deadlines. Exceptional
attention to detail, capable of delivering error-free content & designs.
What you can expect:
Exposure to a platform that welcomes and appreciates your creativity and hard work.

Job Description:
Job Overview:

We are seeking a highly creative and skilled Graphic Designer to join our team. As a Graphic Designer, you will play a crucial role in creating visually appealing and impactful designs for various marketing materials, branding, digital platforms, and print collateral. Your expertise in design software and understanding of design principles shall play a key role in fulfilling your job responsibilities.

Responsibilities:

Design Creation:
Develop visually compelling and on-brand designs for digital and print materials, including brochures, posters, social media graphics, and presentations
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand design requirements and conceptualize design solutions that meet project goals

Branding and Identity:
Assist in the development and maintenance of brand guidelines, ensuring consistent and cohesive branding across all channels.
Design and update brand assets, including logos, colour schemes, typography, and other visual elements

Digital Design:
Create engaging designs for website graphics, email templates, banners, and other digital marketing assets to enhance user experience and drive engagement
Optimize designs for various digital platforms, ensuring responsiveness and compatibility

Print Design:
Design print materials such as product packaging, promotional materials, event signage, and trade show displays.
Coordinate with print vendors to ensure accurate production and quality of printed materials

Creative Ideation:
Stay updated on design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to infuse fresh and innovative ideas into design projects.
Participate in brainstorming sessions and provide creative input to shape design concepts and strategies

Collaboration and Communication:
Effectively communicate design concepts and rationale to team members and stakeholders, incorporating feedback and making necessary adjustments.
Collaborate with copywriters, marketers, and other team members to ensure visual and messaging alignment.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design projects
Proficiency in graphic design software, Adobe Creative Suite
Understanding of design principles, typography, colour theory, and layout composition
Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creativity
Keywords: Design Skills, Graphic Designing, Adobe Creative Suite, Webflow, Digital Media, Print Media, logo, Logo Design, Brochure Design

Job Description:
We are looking for a UI/UX Designer Intern to turn our software into easy-to-use products for our clients.
UI/UX Designer responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components.
To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools.
If you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that include work with web/mobile applications, we d like to meet you.
Ultimately, you ll create both functional and appealing features that address our clients needs and help us grow our customer base.
Responsibilities
Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers
Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps
Design graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs and widgets
Build page navigation buttons and search fields
Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like
Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback
Adhere to style standards on fonts, colours and images
Requirements
Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role
Portfolio of design projects
Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g. Wireframe.cc and InVision)
Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
Good time-management skills
BSc in Design, Computer Science or relevant field

Job Description:
About Company:
HealthKart is Indias leading nutrition and supplement platform that offers a comprehensive range of products, engagement tools and expert assistance for all your wellness and fitness needs.
Founded in March 2011 by Sameer Maheshwari, an IIT and Harvard Business School graduate, HealthKart is your one-stop fitness and health destination. We focus on Quality, Authenticity, Affordability and Accessibility while delivering good health at your doorstep.
HealthKart is proud to have two marquee nutrition brands - MuscleBlaze & HealthKart - which are leaders in their respective segments. HealthKart also has over 200 brands and authorized vendors listed on the website - all just to make sure what our customers get is right and authentic.
HealthKart follows an omni-channel distribution strategy with 100+ retail stores spread across 35 cities. We also have a presence in modern trade and general trade, as well as on horizontal e-commerce platforms like Amazon, Flipkart, Nykaa and many more.
We have been expanding rapidly and currently employ over 1000 people. We have also served more than 10M happy customers raising over US$ 75M funds till date.

Job Description:
Someone who knows how to gather the right information and tools to prepare creative and impactful work
Graphic Designer Job Duties:
Prepares work to be accomplished by gathering information and materials.
Plans concept by studying information and materials.
Illustrates concept by designing rough layout of art and copy regarding arrangement, size, type size and style, and related aesthetic concepts.
Obtains approval of concept by submitting rough layout for approval.
Prepares finished copy and art by operating typesetting, printing, and similar equipment; purchasing from vendors.
Prepares final layout by marking and pasting up finished copy and art.
Ensures operation of equipment by completing preventive maintenance requirements; following manufacturer's instructions; troubleshooting malfunctions; calling for repairs; maintaining equipment inventories; evaluating new equipment.
Completes projects by coordinating with outside agencies, art services, printers, etc.
Maintains technical knowledge by attending design workshops; reviewing professional publications; participating in professional societies.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
Keywords: Executive, HR

Job Description:
We are seeking talented and innovative Motion Graphic Designers and 2D Animators to join our Video Production Team
The team is dedicated to crafting high-quality Video Courses that revolve around Digital Marketing concepts for learning purposes
Our production process involves the use of industry-standard software, including Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, and Da Vinci Resolve, alongside various AI tools, plugins, extensions, and software applications
Collaboration is key, as we closely engage with the Content, Student Experience, and Social Media teams
In this role, your tasks will encompass:
Crafting seamless and sleek Motion Graphics and 2D animations using After Effects.
Collaborating actively with video editors, content writers, and other relevant teams.
Incorporating appropriate visual elements such as text, images, GIFs, and videos.
Managing tasks within demanding timelines.
Video Production Skill Set
Developing 3-4 minute animated videos featuring insights from Digital Marketing industry experts.
Creating dynamic marketing videos enriched with visual effects, overlays, sound effects, and animations.
Producing long-form content in the form of trend-focused Masterclasses.
Generating innovative solutions for visual components.
This position aligns with you if:
You thrive on producing top-tier content within stringent deadlines.
You are an aspiring motion graphic designer or 2D animator keen on continuous growth within our environment.
Experimenting with various animation styles and editing techniques excites you.
Your strong communication skills enable you to work effectively within a team and exhibit confidence.
Conceptualizing, designing, and executing design assets come naturally to you.
You are well-acquainted with the Adobe Suite.
Requirements:
We are looking for candidates who meet the following criteria:
Solid understanding of design principles and color theory.
Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, including experience with extensions and plugins.
Strong communication skills for effective collaboration.
Access to a personal laptop or desktop computer.
Ability to adhere to moodboards and visual guidelines to maintain design consistency.
A thirst for learning and contributing fresh perspectives to the team.
Successful completion of the team s overall vibe assessment.
Keywords: Graphics, Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social media, Production, Animation, 2D Animator, Adobe After Effects, Digital marketing, Application software

Job Overview:

The Graphic Designer will be responsible for creating high-quality designs for display banners, website banners, and social media by visualizing and creating graphics including creatives, illustrations, and templates backed by strong conceptualization. Additionally, the candidate must possess the ability to lead a team of graphic designers and hold responsibility for the collective outcome of the design team. Incorporating new ideas and designs that are competitive in the highly competitive industry of digital marketing is a must. Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. The goal is to inspire and attract the target audience. Proven graphic designing experience.
Ability to resolve complex design and communications into a digital platform.
A strong portfolio of creatives/videos in advertising or marketing agencies.
Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Corel draw, After effects and other video editing software, CAD Tools)
A keen eye for aesthetics and details
Excellent communication skills
Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines.
Degree in Design, Fine Arts, or related field is a plus.
Experience of 5+ years

We are seeking a talented graphic designer to join our creative team

As a graphic designer, you will be responsible for creating compelling visual content for a variety of mediums, including print, digital, and social media

This is an exciting opportunity to bring your creativity and design skills to contribute to our organization s visual identity and marketing efforts
Responsibilities:
Create visually appealing graphics, illustrations, logos, banners, infographics, social media posts, and other marketing collateral based on project briefs or client requirements.

Prepare design files for production, including creating print-ready files, optimizing digital graphics for web use, and providing necessary specifications to printers or developers.
Assist in revisions and edits to design materials based on feedback from team members or clients, and work iteratively to refine designs until they are finalised.
Stay updated with industry trends, software updates, and best practices in graphic design to continually improve skills and contribute fresh ideas to the team.
Maintained files and project documentation in an organised manner for easy retrieval and reference.
Support other design-related tasks, such as photo retouching, image sourcing, or creating mockups to support the overall design process.
Requirements:
Strong proficiency in Adobe Illustrator & other design schools.
Solid understanding of design principles, including layout, colour theory, typography, and composition.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, meet deadlines, and adapt to changing priorities.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work with precision.
Portfolio of previous design work demonstrating creativity and technical skills.

Any graduate: Any specialisation
Any postgraduate: Any specialisation

Job Description:
Job Description
Job Title: Graphic Designer
The Graphic Designer is responsible for creating visually stunning and engaging graphics, promotional materials, and marketing collateral to promote our Brand and its offerings. This role will play a pivotal part in enhancing the cinema's brand identity and driving audience engagement through creative design solutions.
Key Responsibilities:
Design Visual Assets: Create eye-catching posters, banners, flyers, and other promotional materials for upcoming movie releases, special events, and promotions.
Brand Consistency: Ensure that all design materials align with the cinemas brand guidelines and maintain a consistent visual identity.
Digital Marketing: Design engaging graphics for social media campaigns and collaborate with Movie Influencers
Print Materials: Design and prepare print-ready materials for in-house signages and branding, menus, brochures and promotional merchandise.
Photo Editing: Retouch and edit movie stills, promotional images, and other visual content to enhance their quality and appeal.
Collaboration: Collaborate with the marketing team to understand campaign objectives and provide creative input on design concepts.
Video Graphics: Occasionally create motion graphics and video animations for promotional videos and presentations.
Market Research: Stay updated with industry trends, competitor designs, and emerging design techniques to continually improve design strategies.
Feedback Integration: Actively seek and incorporate feedback from team members and stakeholders to refine design projects.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field.
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, preferably with experience in the entertainment or cinema industry.
Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDRAW, Canava) and knowledge of video editing software is a plus.
Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects.
Excellent understanding of design principles, layout, typography, and color theory.
Creative thinking and the ability to translate marketing objectives into visually appealing designs.
Adaptability and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment with tight deadlines.

Salary: 2,40,000 3,00,000 LPA.

Contact HR@ 8591749731

104, Rachna Bldg, V.P. Road,
Vile Parle (W), Mumbai 400 056, India,
Near Nanavati Hospital.
Mail: careers@goldcinema.co
Keywords: Banners, Brochure Design, Posters, Graphic Designing, Logo Design

Job Description:
A graphic designer is a person who gives the shape and design to the products after completely understanding the needs of the client.
Skills and Qualifications
A graphic designer works on a plethora of areas like websites, apps, books, magazines and banners.
This requires a highly creative mind. His duty is to project the brand in such a manner that it entices the prospective customer.
He needs to interact with the clients to understand the projects before undertaking it.
The layout design must be compiled to meet the objectives of the client and help grow the brand. Anyone planning to get into this field must have experience in Graphic Designer Jobs or shall have completed graduation in visual arts.
Expertise in the following will also aid your job prospects::
3D design
Communication design
Film/television
Fine art
Illustration
Graphic design
Photography
Visual Art
Roles and Responsibilities
Being a graphic designer is challenging as you are the brain behind how the client s business is being projected. A designer s job is to present information in a way that is both accessible and memorable. Here are some brief details on the responsibilities of a graphic designer:
Briefing with the clients or their representatives to understand their needs and objectives comprehensively.
Development of the graphic designs that suits and meet the objectives of the clients.
Coming up with some innovative thoughts and ideas to make the client s brands stand out.
Redefine the design briefs with your creativity and skills while meeting the deadline.
Presentation of the ideas before clients for approval.
Having the ability to work with CAD and other technical aspects to produce some captivating graphics.
Refining the designs to come up with accurate and error free designs in alignment to the client s objective.
Working in cohesion with the other members of the team like co-designers, printers, illustrators, copywriters amongst various others to help in serving the clients optimally. Good team skills to work in harmony with the team is vital as in any other job.
Keywords: Graphics, Photography, 3D, Graphic designing, communication design, Layout design, PDF, Illustration, CAD, HR

Job Description:
About Info Edge

InfoEdge's mission is to create world-class platforms that transform lives by continuously innovating. Our products and services are built keeping our customers in mind. We always delight our customers by delivering superior value through enhanced offerings on the internet and other platforms. Through our continuous investment across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), we have built a robust system that constantly increases our predictive powers on customer behavior, and optimizes and improves our systems. Our various teams tirelessly work together to solve problems, innovate, and create something to empower our customers.
At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent.

About BU: JobHai

We are a strategic portfolio within IEIL with a clear focus on creating large-scale opportunities for blue collared jobseekers to get aligned to potential employers across geographies with a mission of creating a robust digital ecosystem with simplification of hiring needs.
With our pilot launch in 2019, we have created our presence across markets, with a 100+ strong team and 7.5 million+ traffic, 5 million+ jobseeker database, 160k+ active listings across 14 cities, 100k+ recruiter base, 10 million+ monthly actions on platform and overall, 10x growth over the last 12 months.

Role Objective:

With the business poised for the next phase of growth, we are at a juncture where developing the brands visual language would be crucial in driving differentiation in the users mind. To that end, this role will be the ultimate custodian for owning & driving the design charter for the brand. Our aim is to create a brand that speaks to the pain & passion points of our users (in a visually compelling manner) that resonates with them. So if you are somebody that thrives on tapping into human emotions via semiotics & likes to add a dash of creativity to every piece of communication no matter how big or small then this role is the right fit for you.

Job Description

You will be the owner of the entire design charter as part of the brand team & will be responsible for crafting & executing the brand design systems (in line with the newly developed brand positioning) across all touchpoints
You will be responsible for design & delivery of all marketing collaterals for our digital/growth campaigns across channels
You will work closely with copy/product/marketing automation teams & be responsible for all owned media channels including email, push notifications, SMS, WhatsApp communication, etc.
You will liaise with copy & social to ideate & develop content for digital & social campaigns
You will be interfacing with senior stakeholders from across functions (product, growth, digital/performance marketing, etc.) & be responsible for managing all design workflows & meeting timelines

Desired Experience:

Skilled Graphic designer with a strong handle on Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator (should have experience designing creatives for diverse digital platforms like GDN/Meta universe, etc. static, carousel, across specs). Strong handle on Motion Graphics is an absolute must (we would want to create high quality videos for our digital/social campaigns internally so this will be an important skillset to have)
Should be current on trends & have a concept-first (not design-first) approach to creation & work collaboratively with copy to deliver impactful creatives
Strategic thinking with critical brief evaluation - will be responsible for crafting & executing brand design systems across all touchpoints
Ability to project manage on briefs & work collaboratively with senior stakeholders as they will be owner of the design charter for Job Hai
A strong eye for visual composition
4-6 years of experience in graphic design & motion Graphics/video editing - preferably in advertising but open to freelancers as well (design experience for massy Bharat-first brands/BOP marketing would be a big plus)
Demonstrable graphic design skills with a strong portfolio

Why Join Us:

If you have boundless energy, are ambitious, bubbling with ideas, are hardworking, have no problems taking a hands-on approach to your work, then this is the place for you. People who have risen the fastest in our company are those that have a keen eye for detecting critical business problems and then solving them thus making needle moving impact. The InfoEdge work culture is very friendly, collaborative, entrepreneurial and empowering. We encourage our team members to take responsibility and grow into future leaders in our company.
Keywords: motion graphics, marketing, Video Editing, Visual Effects, graphic designing, Animation, brand

Company Name: H P Singh Agencies Pvt Ltd
Job Description:
Position Overview:
Are you an innovative Menswear Designer with a passion for creativity and a flair for fabrics? Do you have an insatiable appetite for creating unique and stylish clothing for men? If yes, we are looking for you! Join us in shaping the future of menswear fashion by blending ethnic and non-ethnic styles with cutting-edge fabrics and designs. You will be responsible for building a new menswear brand from the ground up.

Responsibilities:
Creative Design: Develop innovative and trend-setting menswear designs that cater to both ethnic and non-ethnic fashion sensibilities.
Fabric Exploration: Experiment with a wide range of fabrics, exploring traditional Indian textiles and contemporary materials to create distinctive clothing.
Market Research: Stay updated with current fashion trends, consumer preferences, and competitor offerings to ensure our menswear line stands out.
Pattern Making: Collaborate with our skilled pattern makers to bring your designs to life, ensuring a perfect fit and aesthetic appeal.
Quality Control: Maintain a high standard of quality throughout the design and production process, ensuring that every piece meets our rigorous quality criteria.
Collaboration: Work closely with our production team to oversee the manufacturing process, making sure your designs are translated into stunning garments.
Sustainability: Incorporate sustainable practices and materials into your designs, aligning with our commitment to eco-friendly fashion.
Presentation: Create captivating presentations and mood boards to pitch your designs to the team and key stakeholders.
Adaptability: Adapt to changing design requirements and market dynamics to ensure our menswear line remains cutting-edge and relevant.
Qualifications:

Job Title: Internship (3 months - 6 months duration only) - Fashion Designing
Company Name: Leading Apparels Manufacturing company in Gurgaon Sector 34
Job Description:
This is purely an Internship Trainee position for 3 months to 6 months duration only.

The objective of hiring fashion design interns is to provide students and recent graduates with a deeper understanding of the fashion design industry, as well as the skills and experience needed to succeed in this field. Interns have the opportunity to learn about the different aspects of the fashion design process, including market research, trend analysis, sketching and prototyping, and production.

In addition to hands-on experience, they can get to know various opportunities for professional development.

Studying something in theory is very different from actually doing it and internships provide an opportunity to every student to implement their learning. Internships in the fashion industry enhance skills like creativity, research, analysis, sketching, using software and other tools etc. Thus, every student must go through this stage of internship before actually climbing the ladder of their career.
Keywords: Apparel Merchandising, Fashion Designing, Costume Designing, Fashion Illustration, Pattern Making, Sampling

Conceptualizing and creating digital assets based on an agreed brief and brand guidelines
Ensuring high quality, on-time delivery of assigned tasks
Specifically, the role involves: - Creating ad banners for different advertising platforms (Mostly FB and Google) - Designing app icons and app store screenshots - Developing social media creatives - Creating a few app screens including onboarding and tutorials - Designing landing pages and microsites for apps
Ensuring final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand
Following international design trends and creating designs with a modern international appeal.
1 to 2 years of formal industry/professional experience as a graphic designer creating digital assets
Degree in Design or related field is a plus
Good eye for aesthetics: colour, font, layout and design
Strong understanding of the possibilities and limitations of mobile platforms i.e., iOS and Android
Candidate must absolutely be in sync with recent design standards and trends, especially the iOS and Android design guidelines
Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as Illustrator, Photoshop)
Well-read and knowledgeable about global design innovation and proactively using this knowledge to create international quality designs.
A passion for design and experience of working on apps is a must for the job
High level of ownership and a go-getter attitude. At Studio Mosaic, we encourage you to be an independent thinker and self-starter. We are looking for someone who is intrinsically motivated
Ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects is important. You should be able to multitask and deliver under pressure with strict timelines
You will be a part of a team that prides itself on working with each other instead of vs each other. We are looking to hire someone who is a team player and will add to the camaraderie and fun.
A fun, intelligent, empowered and trustworthy team to work with Opportunity to be a part of one of the best app marketing agencies in the world An accomplished and empathetic founding team to guide you.

Job Description:
One of our esteemed clients is looking for experienced, diligent, intelligent, engineers with demonstrated experience.
Main Objective is to maintain design documentation as per the criterias; Manage Continuous Engineering Activity for Existing Products; Improve the Design and Performance of Existing Products.
Roles & Responsibilities:-
1. Generating ideas for new products by researching and testing manufacturing and assembly processes and materials, as well as by examining client requirements and operator feedback.
2. Evaluate and address production difficulties, design optimization, and technological feasibility issues
3. Use simulation and analysis to improve the design by considering thermal, mechanism, and other factors.
4. Testing samples of various components to choose the best ones that meet the requirements of the new product brief
5. Establish and document part/product specifications and test procedures
6. Offer technical assistance and support for any product's industrialization efforts, including manufacturability, tooling, assembly process design, product cost, workflow, quality, and safety.
7. Design and modify machinery for fabricating, building, assembling, and installing components in order to develop and implement manufacturing/assembly processes.
8. Develop prototypes and complete functional testing. Fine Tune designs till they are ready for production
9. Work with other departments to execute design, technology, product development, and vendor strategy
10. Review, approve and / or modify product designs
11. Study, evaluate, and recommend process re-design
12. Assist in day-to-day process development to ensure product quality, timely product shipments, continuing cost effectiveness and profitability
13. Qualify and approve new products from new or existing vendors
14. Analysis & Rectification of errors related to product and its development like designing, quality, etc

Required Skills:
1. Ability to work on own initiative
2. Ability to work under pressure and resolve problems and meet deadlines
3. Good organisational skills and ability to motivate a team
4. Excellent attention to detail and committed to providing exceptional service
5. Should possess excellent communication skills, convincing skills, interpersonal and listening skills, analytical skills.
6. Should be Innovative and Creative in thinking and problem solving.
7. Should possess adequate Business Acumen.
Keywords: Design Engineering, Machine Manufacturing, Design Optimization, Product Design, production

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Graphic Designer with a minimum of 5 years of professional experience in the field
The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in UI/UX design, creative design, PowerPoint (PPT) design, and video design
This individual will be responsible for creating visually compelling and effective designs that align with our brand and business objectives
Key Responsibilities:
1. UI/UX Design:
Collaborate with the UX team to create user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions.
Develop wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs.

2. Creative Design:
Create visually appealing graphics, illustrations, and layouts for a variety of digital and print materials.
Design marketing collateral, including brochures, flyers, posters, and banners.
Conceptualize and execute innovative design solutions that engage and captivate our target audience.

3. PPT Design:
Design and format professional and impactful PowerPoint presentations for internal and external use.
Transform complex data and information into visually compelling slides.
Ensure consistency in branding and design across all presentation materials.

4. Video Designs:
Create and edit video content for marketing campaigns and product demonstrations.
Incorporate motion graphics, animations, and visual effects to enhance video presentations.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts and storyboards.

5. Brand Consistency:
Ensure all designs adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a consistent brand identity.
Collaborate with the marketing and branding teams to evolve and refine the brand's visual elements.

6. Project Management:
Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work.
Communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to gather project requirements and feedback.

7. Stay Updated:
Stay current with industry trends, design tools, and technologies to continuously improve your skills and workflow efficiency.

Qualifications:
Any Bachelor's degree
A minimum of 5 years of professional graphic design experience.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects, Premiere Pro).
Keywords: Graphics, Visual Effects, Graphic designing, Illustrator, adobe creative suite, Project management, Creative designing, Photoshop, Usability testing

Youll be the one to shape the visual aspects of websites, books, magazines, product packaging, exhibitions and more. Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. Job Description:
About the job

Job Title: Senior Graphic Designer
Opening- 02 (Immediate Joiner)
Salary- As per market standard
Location- Noida sector 62
Timings : 5 PM-2 AM (drop facilities available)
Monday - Friday (5 days working)

Company Overview:
Sellryt is an e-commerce solutions provider that specializes in helping businesses succeed on Amazon and other online marketplaces. The company offers a range of services, including product listing optimization, inventory management, and marketing automation. With a team of experienced professionals and a proven track record of success, Sellryt is committed to helping its clients grow and thrive in the competitive world of e-commerce.

Job Overview:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Graphic Designer with at least 6 years of experience to join our team. As a Senior Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for creating high-quality and visually stunning designs for our clients Amazon products. You will craft compelling info-graphic designs that showcase the features of branded products that help drive sales.

Responsibilities:
Coordinate with our clients to understand their design requirements and deliver the creatives as per their expected quality, within the given time frame, and in the requested delivery format.
Understand product offerings, briefs, brands theme, and research the websites to grasp the benefit of the product to create knowledgeable content.
Research the marketplace to understand the competition and the latest trend being followed in the product category.
Conceptualize visuals based on requirements and prepare a rough draft to get clientÃÂs approval.
Use the appropriate colors and layouts as per the brand guidelines.
Follow the marketplace/Amazon guidelines while creating the designs.
Use tools like InDesign, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, and Photoshop to deliver quality designs efficiently.
Work with copywriters and the creative director to produce the final design
Seek feedback from clients on the work quality and implement the feedback to improve the same.
Train junior graphic designers to follow the best practices and SOPs required for work delivery.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Design, Fine Arts, or related field.
At least 6 years of experience as a graphic designer, with a focus on creating product designs for e-commerce platforms.
Excellent Communication skills.
Exceptional designing and editing skills, with strong attention to detail
Demonstrated ability to create clear, concise, and persuasive designs that drives conversions.
Familiarity with Amazon creative requirements like product images and videos, enhanced brand content (or A+ images), brand stories, and brand storefront.
Strong research skills and ability to analyze themes to identify trends and opportunities.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Knowledge of tools like Aftereffects is a plus.
If you are passionate about designing compelling creatives that drive sales and are looking for a challenging role in a dynamic and growing company, we encourage you to apply for this position.
Keywords: Branding, Graphic Designing, Visualizing concepts, illustration

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities
1. *Graphic Design:* Creating visually appealing graphics, illustrations, and layouts for various media, such as print, digital, or social media.

2. *Concept Development:* Collaborating with clients or team members to understand project goals and develop creative concepts.

3. *Software Proficiency:* Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or other industry-standard tools.

4. *Typography:* Selecting and manipulating fonts to enhance design aesthetics and readability.

5. *Color Theory:* Understanding and implementing color theory to create visually pleasing and cohesive designs.

6. *Image Editing:* Editing and enhancing photographs or other visual elements as needed.

7. *Brand Consistency:* Ensuring that design work aligns with the client's or company's brand guidelines.

8. *Print Production:* Preparing designs for print, including knowledge of various printing techniques and materials.

9. *Web and Digital Design:* Creating graphics and layouts for websites, social media, and other digital platforms.

10. *Client Communication:* Effectively communicating with clients to gather requirements, provide updates, and incorporate feedback.

11. *Time Management:* Managing multiple projects and deadlines efficiently.

12. *Creativity:* Thinking creatively to come up with unique design solutions for various projects.

13. *Stay Updated:* Keeping up with industry trends and software updates to maintain a competitive edge.

14. *Attention to Detail:* Ensuring the accuracy and quality of design work, including proofreading and checking for errors.

15. *Team Collaboration:* Collaborating with writers, marketers, and other team members to deliver cohesive visual content.

16. *Problem Solving:* Addressing design challenges and finding innovative solutions.

17. *Portfolio Management:* Maintaining a portfolio showcasing previous design work.

Job Title: Senior Front-End Web Developer and Graphic Designer
Job Description:
As a Senior Front-End Web Developer and Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly web interfaces that meet our clients' objectives
You will leverage your strong skills in HTML, JavaScript, and graphic design to bring web projects to life, ensuring an engaging and immersive user experience
Responsibilities:

-Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and back-end developers, to understand project requirements and goals.
-Design and develop visually striking and intuitive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring compatibility across different devices and browsers.
-Combine graphic design elements seamlessly into web projects, including logos, illustrations, icons, and other visual assets.
-Optimize web applications for maximum speed and performance, implementing best practices to achieve a responsive and smooth user experience.
-Create and maintain design guidelines and style libraries to ensure consistency across projects and improve overall efficiency.
-Stay updated with the latest front-end development trends, tools, and techniques, and recommend innovative solutions to enhance user interactions and overall website aesthetics.
-Conduct thorough testing and debugging of web applications to identify and fix any issues related to design, responsiveness, or functionality.
-Collaborate with the marketing team to create visually compelling assets for promotional campaigns and digital marketing materials.
-Mentor and provide guidance to junior designers and developers to foster a culture of continuous learning and skill improvement.
-Participate in brainstorming sessions, contributing creative ideas to elevate the quality and impact of our projects.
Requirements:

-Bachelor's degree in Web Design, Graphic Design, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
-Proven track record as a Front-End Web Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with at least [X] years of relevant experience.
-Strong graphic design skills and proficiency in using industry-standard design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite).
-Solid understanding of user experience (UX) design principles and how to apply them to web development projects.
-Experience with responsive web design and cross-browser compatibility.
-Familiarity with front-end frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js) is a plus.
-Excellent attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics and visual composition.
-Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines without compromising quality.
-Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse teams.
-Portfolio showcasing previous web development and graphic design projects.
Keywords: CSS, Front end, Web technologies, HTML

Job Description:
As a Website Designer, you will be responsible for designing and maintaining visually appealing, user-friendly websites that meet our clients' needs and objectives
You will work closely with clients and collaborate with our development team to create exceptional online experiences
Key Responsibilities:
Website Design: Create visually stunning and responsive website designs that align with clients' brand identities and objectives
User Experience (UX) Design: Focus on enhancing user experiences by designing intuitive navigation, user interfaces, and interactive elements
Client Collaboration: Communicate with clients to understand their requirements, provide design recommendations, and incorporate feedback throughout the design process
Content Integration: Integrate text, images, videos, and other multimedia elements into web designs while ensuring content is engaging and coherent
Responsive Design: Ensure websites are optimized for various devices and screen sizes through responsive design techniques
Cross-Browser Compatibility: Test and troubleshoot websites to ensure compatibility across different web browsers
SEO Best Practices: Implement basic SEO principles, such as optimizing images, meta tags, and URLs, to improve website visibility on search engines
Website Maintenance: Continuously update and maintain websites, fixing bugs, updating content, and ensuring security protocols are followed
Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with industry trends, emerging web technologies, and design best practices
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Web Design, Graphic Design, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Proven experience as a Website Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing web design projects
Proficiency in web design software and tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Knowledge of responsive design principles and mobile-first design
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Attention to detail and the ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) like WordPress or Joomla is a plus

Job Description:
We are looking for talented UI Designers Intern who exhibits user empathy, big picture focus; and has mature design craftsmanship and problem-solving skills, who will work collaboratively with UX researchers, product managers and engineers while driving design from concept to final implementation. Drive product strategy and partner closely with cross-functional teams to define and deliver.

Key Objectives/Responsibilities of this Role:
You will work with fellow designers, research, product, and engineering teams to define and create relevant, intuitive, and beautiful experiences that our customers love. 
You will conceptualize and design original ideas that bring simplicity and ease of use to complex design issues. You are a conceptual thinker as well as a craftsperson. Your design work is clean, focused and inspiring to others. 

Mandatory Skillset & Tools:
Portfolio showcasing your proficiency in translating research insights into great product experiences, reflecting the synthesis of good visual and interaction design principles. 
Work in an Agile environment (with Product Owners, Requirement Managers, Developers) to define requirements and design the solution, depending on the project.
Design simple and effective graphics for web and mobile solutions, producing journey maps, storyboards, mock-ups.
Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mock-ups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences.
Design banners, posters, social media posts for campaigns and events
Innovate with evolving customer experience in terms of applying technologies and business models
Ask smart questions, take risks and champion new ideas
Join our Enterprise Operations organization in providing a great visual experience for our range of products.
In this position, you will be challenged to understand business needs as well as users perspectives and put them in a cohesive design which is simple but elegant.
Preferable understanding of Adobe Suite, Figmaor similar tools
Keywords: Wireframing, User Flows, Adobe Suite, Figma, Adobe Xd, Graphic Designing, Visual Design

Job Description:

 For Infographic video, Understand the narrative and objectives of the video content and develop a storytelling approach through effective sequencing and editing techniques.

 Proficiency in graphic design software such as  CorelDraw, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After effect, Final Cut Pro, or other relevant tools.
 Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, layout composition, and video editing techniques.
 Creative thinking and the ability to translate concepts into visually appealing designs and engaging videos.

Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, jQuery, and JavaScript

Job Description:
Job Title: Graphic Designer
Location: NFC, Saket, Delhi / Noida Sector 63
Job Type: Full-Time
Requirement: Immediate

Job Overview:

A graphic designer is responsible for conceptualizing, designing, and producing visual materials that effectively convey a message or meet a specific purpose. They work in a variety of industries, including advertising, marketing, web design, print media, and more.

Key Responsibilities:

Design Creation: Develop visually appealing designs for a wide range of projects, including logos, brochures, catalogs, posters, websites, social media graphics, advertisements, and other marketing collateral.
Conceptualization: Collaborate with clients or team members to understand project objectives, target audience, and messaging, and translate these into creative design concepts.
Knowledge of web development, digital marketing concepts, branding & communication and best practices.
Proficient in Branding, Package design and illustration.
A good portfolio of completed design projects.
Designing Marketing communication & collaterals for digital & print mediums.
Designing Emailers, Social ads/post, Google ads, Banners, leaflets, banners etc.
Hands-on experience with image editing software, like Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator/Corel. InDesign, Premiere, Aftereffects and other 2D/3D software are a plus.

Qualifications:

Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects.
Proficiency in design software and tools.
Excellent understanding of design principles, including typography, color theory, and layout.
Creativity, attention to detail, and a keen eye for aesthetics.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Time management and ability to meet deadlines.
Adaptability and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

Required Skills:

Animation and motion graphics.
Adobe, Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, Corel Draw, Adobe illustrator
Knowledge of user experience (UX) design principles.
Keywords: Ui/Ux, Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Designing, Photoshop, Visual Effects, Motion Graphics, Figma, Canva, Corel Draw, Indesign, Adobe Creative Suite
