Job Description:
About the Function:
The Hotels Content team of MakeMyTrip is an integral part of the hotels LOB for both domestic and international hotels. It is responsible for ensuring the effectiveness of all customer and partner-facing communication and enhancing the overall booking experience on the app/website through relevant content touchpoints. The team specializes in end-to-end content workflows, ranging from concise and informative funnel copies to long-form content.

About the Role:
This role demands a clear understanding of UX, social media, After effects, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator. The position requires collaboration with cross-functional teams including Supply, Category, Creative, and Product.

Key Competencies-
The ideal candidate for this role is someone who:
Has 2-3 years of experience in creating graphics, videos, newsletters, reels for social media, mailers, infographics & similar assets.
Has an eye for detail and comes with a creative mindset.
Can meet strict timelines while ensuring the quality of projects.
Aspires to take on new challenges and drive positive outcomes.
Possesses strong interactive and interpersonal skills.

Qualification & Experience:
Professional degree in Graphic Designing/Mass Communication, or a related field.
2 years of work experience in creative content writing and editing (both short and long-form content) (Preferably from the Travel domain).
Prior experience in writing marketing & handling social media (Instagram, Facebook, etc.) (samples requested)
Has a good understanding of MS Office Suite, CMS tools, After Effects, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator.
Previous experience in travel and e-commerce will be a plus!

What will you be doing?
Creating social media assets, mailers, newsletters, videos, gifs, and similar creative assets.
Crafting engaging copies for social media and product that drives booking decisions.
You're a self-starter, who is able to multi-task and adhere to timelines.
You believe in initiating conversations & taking end-to-end ownership of projects, right from ideation to execution.
You possess good time management skills, including prioritizing, scheduling, and adapting as necessary.
Key Learnings in the Role:
Get the opportunity to work with India's No. 1 travel company and learn about creating diverse forms of content, instrumenting in shaping the user experience of millions of travellers.
Be at the helm of content strategy for high-impact projects and leverage the growth opportunities while working in a cross-functional environment.
Keywords: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Designing, Adobe Creative Suite

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer with knowledge of mobile accessories and printing to join our team. In this role, you will utilize your design skills and understanding of mobile accessories and printing processes to create visually appealing designs for various marketing materials. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop concepts, ensure print feasibility, and produce high-quality designs that align with our brand and meet the needs of our target audience

Role & responsibilities
Design Creation: Develop visually appealing designs for marketing materials related to mobile accessories, including packaging, labels, inserts, product catalogs, and promotional materials.
Mobile Accessories Knowledge: Understand the basics of mobile accessories, such as phone cases, chargers, screen protectors, and other relevant products, to create designs that effectively showcase their features and benefits.
Printing Expertise: Possess a strong understanding of printing processes, materials, and techniques specific to mobile accessory design to ensure print feasibility and optimize design for production.
Branding and Identity: Maintain consistency with our brand guidelines and visual identity across all designs and materials, reinforcing our brand image and message.
Layout and Composition: Apply design principles, typography, and layout techniques to create visually balanced and impactful designs that communicate the desired message and highlight product features.
Image Editing and Manipulation: Enhance product images, including retouching, color correction, and resizing, to ensure high-quality visuals that captivate customers.
Print Production Coordination: Collaborate with internal teams and external print vendors to ensure accurate color reproduction, optimal print quality, and timely delivery of printed materials.
Quality Control: Conduct thorough reviews of print proofs and samples to ensure accuracy, color fidelity, and adherence to design specifications before final production.
Market Research: Stay updated on industry trends, emerging mobile accessories, and printing technologies to incorporate innovative design concepts and techniques into projects.
Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and maintain organized files and documentation.
Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product management, and print vendors, to gather project requirements, provide design solutions, and present concepts.
Continuous Learning: Proactively enhance design skills, keep up with evolving design software and tools, and explore new printing techniques to continuously improve the quality and effectiveness of designs.

Preferred candidate profile
Male/Female candidates are eligible to apply this position.
Bachelors degree in graphic design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
Candidates for this position must be comfortable with night shifts, as the role involves working remotely during nighttime hours.
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong emphasis on mobile accessory design and printing.
Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other relevant tools.
Strong knowledge of mobile accessories and their features, trends, and target audience preferences.
Familiarity with printing processes, materials, and techniques specific to mobile accessory design.
Solid understanding of design principles, typography, layout, and composition.
Excellent attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Job Description:
As a Concept Designer at DART, you will be an integral part of our innovative and dynamic design team, responsible for creating captivating and cutting-edge space concepts that align with our clients visions and objectives
Your role will involve conceptualizing and strategizing unique retail experiences that not only meet client requirements but also push the boundaries of creativity and functionality
You will be expected to deliver compelling design solutions that resonate with consumers and drive business growth for our clients
Key Responsibilities
Design Concept Development: Collaborate with the project team to interpret client briefs and translate them into compelling and feasible space design concepts. Ensure that designs reflect the brand identity, values, and marketing objectives of the client.
Strategy Formulation: Analyze client requirements and market trends to develop effective strategies that optimize the spaces functionality, customer flow, and overall user experience. Implement innovative and practical ideas that set our designs apart.
Ideation and Innovation: Cultivate a culture of innovation by regularly brainstorming and exploring new design ideas, technologies, materials, and spatial concepts. Strive to bring fresh and forward-thinking approaches to each project.
Client Presentations: Prepare visually engaging and informative design decks that showcase the proposed concepts and strategies. Articulate the technical aspects of the design to clients effectively and address any queries or concerns they may have.
Market Research: Stay abreast of the latest design trends, consumer behavior, and industry developments. Conduct in-depth market research to understand emerging technologies, materials, and best practices to incorporate into our designs.
Technical Expertise: Possess a strong understanding of space design technicalities, such as layout planning, fixture design, lighting, and signage. Collaborate with technical teams to ensure that designs are feasible and can be implemented successfully.
Brand Alignment: Ensure that each concept aligns with the clients brand identity and storytelling. Incorporate the brands ethos into the design to create a cohesive and immersive customer experience.
Project Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including architects, graphic designers, and project managers, to deliver integrated and comprehensive solutions.
Requirements
Bachelors degree in design, Interior Designor or related field.
Proven experience in space design, experiential design, or related fields with a strong portfolio showcasing innovative and successful design concepts.
Proficiency in design software, such as PhotoShop, Figma etc
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey design ideas to clients and internal teams.
Strong knowledge of current design trends, materials, and technologies.
Ability to multitask, work under pressure, and meet project deadlines.
Exceptional creative thinking, problem-solving, and attention to detail.
A passion for creating exceptional space design experiences and staying ahead of industry trends.
Keywords: Retail, Software design, Concept development, Strategy formulation, Conceptualization, Market research, Customer experience, Layout planning, Photoshop

Your role will focus exclusively on Instagram, making it essential to understand the platforms unique design requirements and trends
Responsibilities
Visual Content Creation: Develop visually stunning and engaging content exclusively for Instagram, including graphics, images, videos, stories, reels, and carousels.
Brand Aesthetics: Ensure all Instagram content aligns with our brand aesthetics and maintains a consistent look and feel.
Instagram Strategies: Collaborate closely with our social media strategists to implement and enhance Instagram-specific marketing strategies.
Hashtag Strategy: Research and implement effective hashtag strategies to increase the discoverability of our content.
User Engagement: Encourage user engagement through interactive and visually appealing posts, stories, and other Instagram features.
Trend Identification: Stay up-to-date with Instagram trends, updates, and features, integrating them into our content strategy when relevant.
Analytics and Optimization: Analyze Instagram Insights to track the performance of content and make data-driven decisions to optimize our Instagram presence.
Qualifications & Skills
Proven experience as a Social Media Designer with a specific focus on Instagram.
Proficiency in graphic design software (eg, Adobe Creative Suite, Canva).
Strong knowledge of Instagrams visual requirements, including dimensions, aspect ratios, and file formats.
Exceptional creativity and artistic skills with a strong eye for detail.
Ability to adapt quickly to Instagram algorithm changes and trends.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Knowledge of Instagram ad creation is a plus.
A portfolio showcasing your Instagram design work is required.
Education: A degree in graphic design, visual arts, or a related field is preferred but not mandatory.

The Design Engineer responsibilities are related to the management and execution of ETO projects produced in Fiorenzuola plant, meeting the target dates and assuring a high output quality, this to release into production the orders timely to respect the contractual delivery date.

Responsibilities
Detailed analysis of the technical part of the orders
Interaction with Inside Sales, PMO and Application Engineering departments to clarify the definition of the scope of supply
Selection of correct actuator components and materials according to the scope of supply
Design of new actuator models (complete actuator, subassemblies, VMK), respecting best engineering practices, applicable regulations and standards and keeping into consideration manufacturing feasibility and safety aspects
Selection and technical definition of VOS components based on technical requirements like functionality, materials suitable for the application, customer specifications, applicable regulations and standard
Strict cooperation with purchasing department and suppliers for technical discussion and clarification regarding components selection and definition
Production of technical documentation requested by the projects such as bill of materials, assembly drawings, manufacturing drawings, calculations,
Interaction with PMO department to support in case of technical clarifications or comments received by customer, if needed attending technical meetings with customer
Support to technical documentation team for correct documentation release (mainly overall dimensional drawings and instruction and operating manuals)
Interaction and support to VOS Design engineers and to documentation engineers based in and out Fiorenzuola
Support to Operations department during assembly and testing of the actuators, to solve any issue which can occur during these activities.

Job Description:
As a CC Design Engineer, you will be responsible for activities contributing to the design and development of products, solutions, and systems
Includes activities linked to technical improvement of existing products and components
Positions requiring an understanding of concepts, methods, and procedures (technical bachelor s degree)
Lead requisition jobs of Flange-to-Flange Centrifugal compressors for Turbomachinery products working with internal & Global stakeholders

As a CC Design Engineer, you will be responsible for:
Understanding customer requirements and design details for a project and preparing detailed calculations on machine selection, Rotor dynamics, thermodynamics, Performance calculations & followed by mechanical design of 2D cross-section of the machine on NX in line with our policies and standards.
Working closely with all stake holders to understand the design details and finalize to have a standard machine to reduce cycle time
Having strong basic mechanical Knowledge of Thermal , Materials, Geometric Dimension & Tolerance (GD&T) awareness, capability to perform hand calculations
Reviewing the raw & machining drawings and releasing them in Team Center PLM.
Releasing Engineering docs in the VDR domain to customers and other stakeholders as per requirements
Working closely with counterparts and leadership to provide necessary support & quality deliverables to Customers in the VDR domain.
Working on priority to meet the metrics of on-time delivery / Quality / Productivity. Work closely with suppliers in advance to meet the metrics.
Developing automation abilities using digital tools and methods in order to produce faster and better outputs

Fuel your passion
To be successful in this role you will:
Have BE/BTech OR ME/MTech in Mechanical/Turbomachinery Engineering with a minimum of 0 to 10 years of designing experience in turbomachinery products and systems.
Have hands-on experience in Thermodynamic & Rotor-dynamics calculation for Turbomachinery products
Have experience in Oil & Gas Domain working closely with customers.
Have experience in Compressor, Expander design knowledge with experience resolving customer issues
Have a technical background in centrifugal compressors oriented toward the understanding of the P&I structure/base logic system.
Be able to bring new improvements in process, design & Cycle time reduction to be compliant with quality & business requirements.
Have engineering effort knowledge to evaluate/manage standard requirements (when needed)
Have well committed to the target i.e., critical issue/workload pick to be managed in a very short time
Have expertise in Tools: UG Nx and Team Center.
Keywords: Process design, PLM, Cycle time reduction, Thermodynamics, Automation, Finance, Mechanical, Quality engineering, thermal, Mechanical design

Job Description:
Schematic Design: Assist in creating and modifying electronic circuit schematics using industry-standard software (e.g., Altium, Eagle, KiCad, or any other similar softwares).
PCB Layout: Participate in the PCB layout process, including component placement, routing, and ensuring design compliance with industry standards and best practices.
Component Selection: Help select and source electronic components that meet project requirements in terms of cost, performance, and availability.
Prototype Development: Collaborate with the team to build and test prototypes of designed circuits and PCBs.
Testing and Troubleshooting: Assist in testing and debugging electronic circuits, identifying issues, and proposing solutions.
Documentation: Maintain detailed design documentation, including circuit schematics, PCB layouts, and BOMs (Bill of Materials).
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including hardware and software engineers, to ensure seamless integration of circuitry into our products.
Research and Development: Stay updated with the latest industry trends and emerging technologies in circuit and PCB design.
Qualifications:
Pursuing or a degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics, or a related field.
Strong understanding of electronic circuits and PCB design principles.
Proficiency in PCB design software (e.g., Altium, Eagle, KiCad).
Basic knowledge of electronic components and their specifications.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Effective communication and teamwork abilities.
Eagerness to learn and a passion for electronics design.
Benefits
Hands-on experience in real-world circuit and PCB design projects.
Mentorship from experienced engineers.
Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and industry practices.
Networking opportunities within the engineering community.
Potential for future career opportunities within the company.

You will be part of a dynamic team of designers, project managers and consultants who would work complementary to each other, achieve common goals, and eventually help the brand grow. Because we know, success only comes by working together and perfecting the processes.
Of course, you will need to pursue/hold a degree/diploma of Interior Designing, but apart from that we are considering few more traits and attributes from you:
0-3 years of experience as an Interior Designer. Fresher's can apply for internship programs for a duration of 3-6 months.
Excellent interpersonal communication skills with a flair for writing blogs that would be published on our website.
Entrepreneurial spirit, thinking on your feet, excellent organization, and project-time management skills.
Additional Roles and Responsibilities
- Good communication skills
- Client Handling
- AutoCAD 2D drafting
- Photoshop preferable
- 3ds Max + V-ray preferable
- MS Office
Holds design expertise in: -
1) Conceptual design (layout, mood-board, style)
2) Technical design (material knowledge, drawing preparation and execution)
3) Modular design (material knowledge, aesthetics and functionality, module planning)
4) Civil work and services (specs and installation details).
Superior analytical capabilities with strong attention to details and comfortable working with numbers for estimating the cost of the project.

Job Description:
We re looking for a senior graphic designer/illustrator to join our in-house apparel design team. The ideal candidate is eager to be part of building our brand language and creating visuals that are both smart and cutting edge. We are looking for someone who has a demonstrated ability to think interdisciplinary and can work across print, digital and space from start to finish. This person is self motivated, curious and has an ability to lead projects from start to finish. If you re a team player, love experimenting with different styles, have a beat on pop culture and an eye for coolhunting we want you on board.
The candidates responsibilities will include:
Designing original and comprehensive communication and campaigns.
Support Apparel design team with branding and graphic design.
Developing packaging for products across the portfolio, including gifts, equipment, and allied VNV services.
Creating print collateral across brand needs, including product-related, training, internal communications.
Art direction and styling.
Assisting the marketing and operations teams in all aspects of execution of events and projects.
Ensuring quality and consistency checks for all design material put out.
Keeping abreast of team timelines consistently and updating project deliverable timelines if any delays occur.
Requirements:
4+ years of experience.
Must be proficient in adobe illustrator, indesign, photoshop.
Must be a concept driven thinker / designer. Should be able to show concept and then application in design.
Must have a strong hold on print and digital layouts / typography and compositions for communication across these mediums.
Should be able to illustrate in illustrator and be able to produce clean vector files.
Must know how to prepare artworks for print and digital publishing ( dielines / crop marks / scaling images for web etc.)
Must have some experience in digital campaigns / collaterals as well as packaging design.
Working knowledge of premier pro / after effects / xd and dimension is a plus.
Must have strong time management skills and organizational skills and be able to work on quick turnaround timelines.
Must be a team player and have a solution oriented mindset.
Keywords: Printing, Graphic designing, Publishing, Web technologies, Illustrator, Time management, digital campaigns, packaging design, Creative Director, Photoshop

Job Description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a talented and creative Senior Graphic Designer to join our team. As a Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for conceptualizing and developing designs for a wide array of digital and print media, aligning with the needs of management and clients. You will play a crucial role in overseeing the production of designs to ensure timely completion and high-quality deliverables.


Responsibilities:

1. Design Conceptualization and Execution:

- Collaborate closely with the team to create concept-based ad campaigns and other design collaterals.

- Develop the creative design strategy for ad campaigns, ensuring alignment with marketing goals.

- Design visually appealing and engaging online and offline marketing materials.

2. Timely Design Delivery:

- Interpret and design according to client's and management's brief within given deadlines.

- Oversee the design production process to ensure designs are completed in a timely manner.

- Communicate with clients directly regarding layout and design, incorporating feedback and making necessary amendments.

3. Design Strategy and Branding:

- Understand marketing objectives, corporate identity, product packaging, advertisements, and design processes.

- Contribute to the development and maintenance of the brand's visual identity through consistent and impactful designs.

- Ensure all designs align with the brand's guidelines and effectively convey the desired message.

4. Graphic Design Skills and Software Proficiency:

- Demonstrate strong graphic design skills with a robust portfolio showcasing creativity and proficiency.

- Utilize design software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and CorelDraw to create visually appealing designs.

- Apply strong conceptualization and typography skills to create impactful and memorable designs.

5. Collaboration and Communication:

- Work both independently and as part of a team, collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and feedback.

- Communicate effectively with team members, clients, and stakeholders to ensure clear understanding of design objectives and deliverables.

Requirements:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Graphic Design or Visual Arts.

- Proven graphic design skills with a strong portfolio showcasing creativity and expertise.

- Understanding of marketing principles, corporate identity, product packaging, advertisements, and design processes.

- Excellent communication skills, proactive nature, and ability to work independently as well as in a team.

- 3+ years of full-time experience in Graphic Designing.

- Proficiency in design software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and CorelDraw.

- Strong conceptualization and typography skills.

- Creative acumen for printing and branding.

- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Keywords: Graphic Designing, Brochures, Print Ads, Illustrator, Banners, Print Media, Photoshop, Logo Design, Brochure Design, Indesign

Job Description:
As a UI/UX Designer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the digital experiences we provide to our users
You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and other designers, to create innovative and user-friendly solutions
Your primary responsibilities will include:
Must have 4-6 years of experience.
UX design experience designing complex solutions for complete digital environments.
Well versed in various compliances related to accessibility such as 508 compliance
Expertise in standard UX software such as Figma, Sketch Axure, InVision, UXPin, Balsamiq, Framer, and the like is a must.

A solid grasp of user-centered design (UCD) process, design thinking, planning and conducting user research, user testing, A/B testing, rapid prototyping, heuristic analysis, usability and accessibility concerns.
Ability to iterate designs and solutions efficiently and intelligently.
Ability to clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to teams and clients.
A clear understanding of the importance of user-centered design and design thinking.
Ability to work effectively in a team setting including synthesizing abstract ideas into concrete design implications.
Be excited about collaborating and communicating closely with teams and other stakeholders via a distributed model, to regularly deliver design solutions for approval.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including software developers, product managers, and healthcare experts, to ensure the successful implementation of designs.
Stay up-to-date with healthcare industry regulations, standards, and best practices to ensure compliance and inform design decisions.
Be passionate about resolving user pain points through great design.
Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism.
Be passionate about all things UX and other areas of design and innovation. Research and showcase knowledge in the industry s latest trends and technologies.

Bachelors degree in UI/UX design, human-computer interaction, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing healthcare-related design work.
Familiarity with HIPAA regulations and experience designing for healthcare environments.
Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch, or similar.

Job Title: Graphic Designer | Investment tech platform | GGN
Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities

Our client is a premier investment platform that unlocks access to Indias most desirable venture capital, private equity & venture debt funds. Backed by a leading Indian VC fund, its tech-first approach streamlines the investment process, making it simple and hassle-free by eliminating cumbersome paperwork and administrative tasks.

Founded in 2022, this Gurgaon based platform is founded by leaders with decades of investing experience earned at some of the most distinguished brands in financial services like Morgan Stanley, GE, IIFL, Kotak, Lumis, among others.

As a Graphic Designer, you will play a pivotal role in crafting compelling visual materials, ranging from financial decks to data visualizations and web design. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure our messaging is not only impactful but also visually captivating.


What you need to do:


Creating visually engaging and informative financial decks that effectively communicate complex information to our clients and stakeholders.
Translating financial data into clear and compelling visuals, infographics, and charts to enhance comprehension and engagement.
Producing original illustrations that align with our brand's visual style for use on our website, blogs, marketing materials, and presentations.
Collaborating with the web development team to design and update websites, ensuring a seamless user experience and visually appealing layouts.
Utilizing design principles to strengthen the impact of our messaging and branding across various channels, maintaining consistency and coherence.
Working closely with marketing, content creators, and other departments to align design with our overall objectives and messaging.
Staying up-to-date with the latest design tools and trends, particularly in Figma, Photoshop, Canva, and other relevant software, and leverage them to bring your creative ideas to life.

What you need to have:


Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects.

Job Description:
As a graphic designer, your primary role is to create visual concepts and designs to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate customers. Your job is to design graphics, layout, and production art for a wide range of mediums including print, digital, and multimedia.
Your responsibilities as a graphic designer include:
* Understanding client needs: Understanding clients needs and developing creative ideas to meet their requirements.
* Conceptualizing designs: Developing design concepts that effectively communicate the intended message or purpose to the target audience.
* Creating visual elements: Creating visual elements such as logos, illustrations, and infographics using a variety of tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, CorelDRAW, and other design software.
* Designing layouts: Designing layouts for print and digital media such as magazines, brochures, social media, websites, and other marketing materials.
* Choosing colors and typography: Selecting appropriate colors, fonts, and other design elements to create visually appealing and effective designs.
* Collaborating with teams: Collaborating with other team members such as copywriters, photographers, and marketers to create cohesive designs that meet client needs.
* Managing multiple projects: Managing multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring all projects are completed on time and within budget.
* Staying up-to-date with design trends: Staying current with industry trends, technology, and software advancements to deliver high-quality designs that meet current design standards.
Keywords: Graphics, Printing, Digital media, Layout design, Software design, adobe creative suite, Social media, Manager Technology, Management, Budgeting

Job Description:
PlanCover.com is an Insurtech broker focused on High Growth Companies (SMBs)

Our mission is to ensure we help high-growth companies with the right risk covers that protect them and their employees. We design and implement convenient and affordable business insurance solutions. We have provided our expertise to businesses across industries ranging from technology, consulting, and professional businesses. Our diverse and strong team is insanely passionate about making businesses and their leaders successful in effectively managing their corporate risks.

For this, we are building a winning team and invite you to be a part of this journey

Who are we specifically looking for?

We are looking for a self-driven person to drive the accountabilities for this profile. You will be an integral part of our journey to both external and internal customers.
You have done it before: You have a proven track record of working in this profile.
You are scrappy: Your aspirations have always been greater than your current reality. You aren't afraid to get creative and can help with building processes.
We are a small, early-growth company aspiring to be the fastest-growing insurtech broker, therefore you need to be a self-starter and someone who will help us craft the playbook as you go along.

We offer a very high growth environment and our expectations are that you will come with an intent to quickly learn and solve problems for our customers and business. If you like some amount of risk, adventure, and an insane amount of learning, you should proceed further and apply.

Role & responsibilities:
Craft visual brand identity, designing logos, typography, and brand assets.
Stay updated on design trends and software updates to enhance skills and efficiency.
Plan creative advertising guarantee, including standard banners, infographics.
Make responsive design that adjust consistently to different gadgets and screen sizes, upgrading client openness and commitment
Translate content ideas into high-quality collateral, including but not limited to social media posts, brochures, banners, flyers, blogs, newsletters, videos, and reels.
Support and execute social media and content strategies that align with our brand and business objectives.
Create logos, chart work, line art, etc.
Design layouts for brochures, collateral materials, etc.
Design layouts for digital/interactive projects (web, mobile, PDF)
Must have: Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop, Figma, Adobe Premiere Pro CC
Good to have: Corel Draw, After Effects, Canva, Affinity Designer

Preferred candidate profile:

Graphic Design Expertise: Demonstrated proficiency in graphic design with a portfolio showcasing branding, promotional materials.
Design Tools: Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop), Coreldraw
Degree: A degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, UI/UX Design, or a related field is preferred.
Innovative Thinking: Creative mindset that pushes the boundaries of design norms to create visually stunning and impactful designs.
User-Centered Mindset: Ability to empathize with users, translating their needs into intuitive and appealing design solutions.
Collaboration: Effective communication and collaboration skills to work closely with multidisciplinary teams.
Responsive Design: Knowledge of responsive design principles to ensure seamless experiences across devices.
Advantage: Web and Mobile application interface design and wire framing prototyping skills. Proficiency in tools like Figma, Sketch, or similar.

Perks and benefits:
You would be joining a company that values career development, collaboration, innovation and inclusiveness. You would be presented with an opportunity to grow your career while developing personally and professionally through various resources and programs.
Health cover for you and your spouse.
The office will serve you subsidised lunch when in office.
Maternity and Paternity benefits
We are a LGBTQ favoured organisation.
Opportunity to work with a highly motivated and ambitious set of people who provide invaluable learning.

Plan and shoot property tours, including capturing the interior and exterior of the properties.
Edit and enhance videos to make them visually appealing and engaging.

Storyboarding and Scripting:
Develop scripts and storyboards for property tours and promotional videos.
Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to ensure the videos convey the desired message.

Graphic Design:
Incorporate graphics, animations, and text overlays to provide additional information and branding.
Create visual elements to enhance the video's aesthetics and convey property details effectively.

Virtual Tours:
Create virtual reality or 360-degree tours of properties for immersive online viewing.
Ensure that the virtual tours are user-friendly and can be easily navigated.

Video Editing:
Edit and post-process video footage to ensure smooth transitions, color correction, and visual enhancement.
Add music, voiceovers, and sound effects where appropriate to enhance the viewer's experience.

Social Media and Website Integration:
Optimize videos for different platforms, including YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, and the company website.
Create and maintain a library of video content for easy access and sharing.

Collaboration:
Collaborate with real estate agents, photographers, and other team members to gather and integrate visual assets for video production.

Market Research:
Stay up-to-date with video design trends in the real estate industry to ensure the company's content remains competitive.

Compliance:
Ensure that all videos adhere to legal and ethical guidelines, including obtaining necessary permissions and avoiding misrepresentation of properties.

Feedback and Improvement:
Collect and act upon feedback from viewers, agents, and management to improve the quality and effectiveness of video content.

Analytics:
Monitor video performance through analytics tools to assess the impact of videos on lead generation and sales.

Training and Technology:
Stay informed about the latest video production equipment, software, and techniques, and provide training to team members as needed.
Keywords: Video Editing, Video Processing

Job Description:
**If you are interested please click on the link and apply: https://mck.co/486vxYu
Behance or Similar Web portfolio is Mandatory.

WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH
You will be part of our global Visual Graphics & Media team. This team is passionate about creating impactful visual communication materials that help our consultants communicate their findings and recommendations, inspire our clients, and push the boundaries of creativity. Based in our McKinsey Global Services office in Chennai, you will work with consultants, creative leads, peer designers, design workflow coordinators, and other colleagues across regions on tasks with international reach.

WHAT YOU'LL DO
You will use your creativity and design skills to transform ideas into visually engaging, interactive, and memorable experiences and products for our clients.
Whether designing a customized presentation or enhancing the visualization of data and key messages for a client meeting, you will collaborate with our consultants and other colleagues to develop compelling visual communication solutions and creative visual strategies for a wide variety of needs. You'll have an opportunity to learn something new every day. While working on design projects for various audiences and purposes, you will gain exposure to all business industries in which McKinsey operates. And you will embark on a design career to grow into further areas such as graphic design, product design, or others.

QUALIFICATIONS
Updated portfolio of graphic design work showcasing samples of branding, slides/decks, layouts, booklets, posters, banners, logos, and/or illustrations in a single PDF file or a web-based portfolio, such as Behance or Dribble
Graduate or final-year student in a design-related field such as graphic design, advertising design, or architecture
1+ years of professional experience/internship or freelancing in a graphics-related field
Knowledge of Adobe suite and ability to express ideas graphically; Additional skills (e.g., motion design, illustration, 3D modeling, vectorial illustration and/or isometrics, web design, UX) are a plus
Ability to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing in English (C1 level - CEFR or equivalent))Good time management and communication skills
Strong attention to detail, quality mindset, and drive for continuous improvement and results
Eagerness to learn, collaborate, and share knowledge and experiences across regions and teams
Outstanding client orientation
Flexibility to work outside traditional business hours

Job Description:
Complex SOC Top Physical Implementation for next generation SOCs in area of mobile application processors, modem sub-systems and connectivity chips by means of Synthesis , Place and Route, STA , timing and physical signoffs
Hands on experience doing physical design and timing closure of complex blocks and full-chip designs.
Experience in top level floor planning including partition shaping and sizing, pin placement, channel planning, high speed signal and clock planning and feed-through planning is a plus.
Should have strong understanding of timing, power and area trade-offs and optimization of PPA.
Power user of industry standard tools (ICC / DC / PT / VSLP / Redhawk / Calibre / Formality) and able to understand their capabilities.
Should have solid understanding of scripting languages such as Perl/Tcl and implementation flows.
Experience with large SOC designs (>20M gates) with frequencies in excess of 1GHZ .
Expertise in block level and full-chip SDC clean up, Synthesis optimization , Low Power checking and logic equivalence checking.
Familiar with deep sub-micron designs (8nm/5nm) and associated issues (manufacturability, power, signal integrity, scaling).
Familiar with typical SOC issues such as multiple voltage and clock domains, ESD strategies, mixed signal block integration, and package interactions.
Familiar in hierarchical design, top-down design, budgeting, timing and physical convergence.
Good understanding of Physical Design Verification methodology to debug LVS/DRC issues at chip/block level.
Should have gone through recent successful SOC tape-outs
Keywords: Semiconductor, SOC, Mixed signal, Intellectual property, Perl, Budgeting, Automotive, Consumer electronics, Signal integrity, Physical design

Job Description:
The design engineer will be responsible for mechanical design, development and analysis oflocomotive and cast resin transformers in Siemens Distribution Transformernetwork.
This willrequire the use of proper engineering principles and application oftransformer design rules and joint review with global counterparts forprototyping.
Performmechanical design and analysis of the tank and externals of locomotivetransformers considering expected vibration in operation.
Use 2D and3D software to model designs and individual parts to support the generation ofengineering drawings and BOM.
Collaboratewith European factories for further product enhancements.
Effectively communicateamong cross functional teams.
What We Need
Bachelor sor masters degree in mechanical engineering preferred
3-5 years working experience as a designengineer (or related roles)
Technical skills
Advanced user of 3D CAD software (eg.CREO/PROe/Inventor/UG), PDM Link/Teamcentre, 2D CAD (eg. AUTOCAD),
Familiar with product requirements in IEC60310 / IEC 60076-11
Knowledge of calculations and designingtransformer tank, stiffeners, cover and external components.
Thorough knowledge of materials to defineand to prepare specification of major items.
Knowledge of selecting of accessories inlocomotive and cast resin transformers.
Key Skills
Excellent written and verbal communicationin English is necessary.
Self-motivated to produce high qualityresults within the time allocated, with limited supervision
Good experience of working with Global Engineeringteams in project execution
Effective co-ordination among manufacturing,suppliers, and customer
Experience with SAP
Keywords: Accessories, SAP, AutoCAD, Resin, Agile, Siemens, Transformers, Mechanical design, Project execution, 3d cad

Job Description:
Interact with the Customers and assist the process of Sale at the Retail Stores, by providing consultative inputs for purchase of products from our catalog.
Liaise with stakeholders in different teams to provide the best suited solution for the customer s requirements.
Achieve and work towards exceeding the monthly targets of Revenue and any other metric as communicated.
Execute tasks of store processes and daily operations at the store for maintaining the standards of store display and ambience.
Execute tasks as assigned during inventory and stock movement, by coordinating with the Operations and Sourcing teams.
Execute Visual Merchandising guidelines for the Store so that it consistently exudes our brand experience.
Take up initiatives and/or small projects as assigned for process improvements in daily tasks, data management Store Operations to boost Store efficiency and profitability.
Navigate between ERPs and data templates to manage your revenue and sales related data.
Requires working on Saturdays/Sundays.
Job Requirement
Retail / Selling and Customer Interaction experience is a must.
Great command of communication / language (English + one vernacular at least) - ability to hold conversations with customers in their dream home, help them pick the right products, understand their sense of aesthetics and guide them accordingly.
High energy, cheerful person + ability to smile always despite the situation / time.
Empathy for people and situations; highly approachable person.
Honesty and transparency in communication; shows warmth in interactions.
Extremely hard-working and committed to the cause / values / vision of UL.
Love for beautiful homes, and all things beautiful; a love for aesthetics.
Willingness to learn rapidly + Ability to consistently make things better.
Ability to use technology effectively + Ability to use apps / tools to provide design / catalog consultation
Keywords: Retail, Sales, Data management, Visual Merchandising, Consulting, Manager Technology, Management, Store operations, Customer interaction

Job Description:
A Solutions Designer supports our Building AutomationSales Group. Building Automation Systems (BAS) control various componentswithin a buildings structure, such as heating, ventilation, air conditioning (HVAC). Components of a BAS include: controllers,sensors, output devices, communications protocols, and a user interface.
The primary responsibility of the Solutions Designer isto complete sales estimates for the sales team including project take-offs, specificationinterpretation, scope of work creation, and risk analysis.
Final deliverables include the final cost estimate andproposal. The Solutions Designer allows the Sales Executive to increasecustomer prospecting, increase customer engagement and focus on bidding strategy.
Lead, coordinate and assume responsibility for the timelygeneration of a cost estimate and proposal.
Perform take off: quantify equipment & device countsfrom bid documents.
Interpret sequence of operations for point count,material and required control devices.
Interpret specifications for all required labor and allcode related requirements.
Understand organization of Master Format Specificationand identify 3rd party integration requirements.
Create system network riser diagram.
Develop Bill of Material (BOM) and Scope of Work (SOW).
Develop value engineering alternatives.
Develop subcontractor technical bid package andcoordinate activity and strategy with Procurement team and Sales Executive.
Obtain quotes from outside vendors for ancillary productsand services.
Develop final customer Proposal.
Communicate and collaborate with a remote sales andoperations team located in another time zone.
Learn and use company design, bid, and quote tools.
Work with the sales team to answer technical and pricingquestions.
Maintain complete documentation for all work performed togenerate estimate and assist in turnover process when estimate/proposal becomesan order.
Participate in Cost Review and Technical Handovermeetings with operations team.
We don t need superheroes, just super minds
Diploma Engineer in Mechanical or Electrical fieldpreferred.
3-5 years Building Automation Systems (BAS) successful experienceand demonstrated competencies in the components of a BAS including:controllers, sensors, output devices, communications protocols, and userinterface.
Strong knowledge of engineering fundamentals, HVACsystems, mechanical systems.
Understand buildings and able to identify HVAC systemequipment requiring automation.
Able to read and interpret mechanical and buildingautomation bid specifications.
Desirable to have experience using an Estimating/Quotingsystem.
Knowledge of building codes and regulations.
Knowledge of building construction process.
Fluent in English language.
Fluent in French language (those assigned to supportQuebec).
Strong Knowledge of Microsoft Office.
Able to interpret customer requirements, identify needsand resolve issues in a positive manner.
Able to adapt to shifting demands and competing prioritiesfrom customers and internal partners to consistently manage time effectivelyand meet established deadlines.
Work is generally performed in an office location withminimal noise and routine distractions.
Must be flexible to work during U.S. working hours (atleast for a portion of the workday).
Possible opportunities for overtime work.
Thisrole is based in Bangalore. But you ll also get to visit other locations inIndia and globe, so you ll need to go where this journey takes you. In return,you ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries andthe shape of things to come. We re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 mindsbuilding the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. Were dedicatedto equality and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of thecommunities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based onqualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativityand help us craft tomorrow.
Keywords: Procurement, Business services, Automation, Bidding, French, System design, Ventilation, SOW, Sensors, Customer engagement

Role: Senior Graphic Designer

Role & responsibilities :

Creative Leadership: Lead the design team, providing creative direction, and ensuring all design work aligns with our brand goals and standards.
Design Execution: Conceptualize and create high-quality designs for print materials, digital campaigns, branding, and more. Produce design deliverables that captivate and resonate with our audience.
Brand Management: Oversee and maintain our brand's visual identity, guaranteeing consistency across all touchpoints and adherence to brand guidelines.
Hands-on Experience: Designing static assets like Infographics pdf, interactive pdf, Ppt formatting. Web based assets line Landing pages, emailers, banners, posters. Creating 2D concepts, background and character designing for animation.
Mentorship: Mentor junior designers, fostering their growth and development within the team. Track their progress and provide guidance.
Collaboration: Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams (marketing, product development, content creators) to ensure cohesive and effective design solutions that meet project milestones.
Advanced Tools: Utilize industry-standard design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite, to produce cutting-edge designs and deliver print-ready and digital design files.
Project Management: Manage multiple projects, ensuring timely completion and resource allocation. Provide design deliverables on schedule.
Stay Current: Keep abreast of design trends, emerging technologies, and best practices, and apply this knowledge to elevate our creative work.


Preferred candidate profile

Bachelor's Degree: Possess a bachelor's/ Postgraduate degree in graphic design or a related field. Or /Graduate (Optional: Diploma or certificate course in the Multimedia field) B.C.A., B. Tech/B.E., B. Sc, B F A/BVA

Leadership Skills: Showcase strong leadership and team management skills, including mentorship of junior designers.
Strategic Thinking: Apply a strategic mindset to align design efforts with overarching business goals and project deliverables.
Attention to Detail: Exhibit exceptional attention to detail, delivering error-free design deliverables consistently.
Adaptability: Thrive in a fast-paced environment by adapting to changing project scopes and priorities.
Communication Skills: Possess excellent communication and presentation skills to convey design concepts effectively.

Job Description:
Design Engineer - Water
We invite you to bring your knowledge on water projects into play as you will be responsible for carrying out the network design for storm water, potable water and waste water. Also, responsible for carrying out the checks of the drawings produced by CAD technicians in the team. To succeed in this role you must have knowledge and thorough understanding of principles of drainage designs for road and airport and must have in depth knowledge of design principles of potable water and waste water . Are you our new Design Engineer - Water? Click the apply-button to send your application.
Inviting bright minds
Do you want to push the boundaries of your profession and develop your excellence in an open, collaborative and empowering culture? We work to create a sustainable future and our inspiring projects and innovative solutions aim to set the standard among our peers. You will join a global company that has been growing successfully since its founding in 1945. Together, we lead and leave a positive impact on societies, companies and people around the world.
You will join our Water department
As our new Design Engineer - Water you will be part of Water team. As a member of the Water team you will be responsible for carrying out the network design for storm water, potable water and waste water. Also, responsible for carrying out the checks of the drawings produced by CAD technicians in the team and maintaining quality of deliverables
Your key tasks and responsibilities will be:
Design Engineer shall co-ordinate with Project Manager and Assistant Engineer/Senior Engineer/Technical Manager/Principal Engineer and be primarily involved in delivering the scheduled tasks in the form of design calculations and drawings.
Design engineer shall co-ordinate with his/her counterparts across the globe while working on international projects.
Your starting point for constant growth
From the moment you join Ramboll, we will support your personal and professional development so that you grow with the company. For this role, we believe your starting point is:
We are looking for self-motivated team members who meet the following requirements:
BE/B. Tech degree in Civil Engineering from an institute of repute. ME/ M. Tech would be desirable,
Should have more than 5 years of experience in drainage design, sewer design and potable water network design. Knowledge of design codes like Euro code/DMRB/AASHTO/any other international standards would be desirable,
Experience of working on airport drainage projects will be desirable
knowledge and understanding of principles of drainage designs for road, airport and rail environment,
should have hands on experience in using any of the drainage design software (Civil 3D, StormCAD, Watergems, Sewergems, SewerCAD InRoads (Storm & Sanitary)
should have knowledge of tools like AutoCAD/Micro Station and preparing drawings in accordance with internationally recognized standard formats,
in addition to technical / functional acumen, he should have good communication skills
Should be a team player and should coordinate within the team for timely delivery of project
Professional English language skills (written and verbal).

company. Enhancing the look of the products through photo-shop

products.

Job Description:
Job Description - Graphic Designer
Description
We are seeking a talented and dynamic Senior Graphic Designer to join our creative team.
As a Senior Graphic Designer, you will play a pivotal role in conceptualizing and executing innovative design solutions that align with our brand identity and business objectives. You will be responsible for leading design projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and mentoring junior designers to ensure the highest quality of visual communication.
Job Title - Graphic Designer
Location - Delhi
Years of experience - Minimum 2 years
A Little Bit About Us
We are a dynamic creative agency specialising in content creation, social media management, branding and design, and performance marketing. Our passion is helping brands captivate audiences through unique and compelling storytelling.
Our talented team combines creative prowess with strategic thinking to craft innovative campaigns that resonate with your target audience. With a deep understanding of brand values and market dynamics, we deliver tailored solutions that drive business growth.
What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to quality and excellence. We go beyond aesthetics, uncovering the unique voice and personality of your brand. Our solutions align seamlessly with your identity, ensuring every piece of content reflects your brands essence.
Job Role and Responsibilities
Create engaging and effective visual content for multiple client brands
Develop brand packages for clients: logos, collaterals and merchandise
Collaborate with creative team to develop design concepts and strategies
Use a variety of technical softwares to design and produce digital and print collateral
Work on multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work
Ensure all designs meet the branding and style guidelines of each client
Job Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or equivalent field
Minimum 1 year of agency experience
2+ years' of professional and creative design experience
Experience using design software such as Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign. Mastery over other tools like animations, editing and 3D rendering will be given due credit.
Strong creative skills with the ability to conceptualize and execute innovative design ideas
Ability to work collaboratively with a team and take direction from senior designers
Excellent communication skills and ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously
PS - The Brand Brew is working for 5 days with a Hybrid model :)

Job Description:
At Iffort, we see graphic design as visual storytelling that engages, informs, and inspires. We're looking for a talented graphic designer who can take concepts and ideas and create visual representations, in digital media. The ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of current design software and be skilled in every step of the design process, from concept to final deliverable. Collaborating with multiple teams across the company, the graphic designer should be able to take written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects. The successful candidate will have a thorough understanding of branding and visualization and be able to find the right style and layout for every project.

Responsibilities
Work on a wide range of projects and media, using various software programs to visualize and develop innovative graphic designs that meet business goals.
Obtain input from managers to ensure that designs meet organizational standards and brand expectations, express ideas accurately, and represent the company or client appropriately.
Work independently as well as cooperatively with the marketing team to meet deadlines, stay within budget, and schedule project implementation based on workload, which may include five or more simultaneous projects.
Examine existing processes, identify flaws, and create solutions that improve design capabilities.
Update and maintain internal databases for designs, photography, and video.
Collaborate, brainstorm, and strategize with multiple teams or clients on a wide range of materials that may include web pages, presentations, programming collateral, signage, internal communications, newsletters, and marketing materials.
Translate strategic direction into the high-quality design within an established brand identity.
Develop concepts by hand or with software and execute original content by determining the ideal usage of color, text, font style, imagery, and layout.
Manage the design and uploading process for all project materials, based on best practices for using a content management system.
Use trend intelligence and knowledge of historical and current markets when designing and executing specific classifications.

Qualifications
Exceptional creativity and innovative design skills.
2-3 or more years of experience (academic and professional) with design software, including Photoshop, After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Illustrator.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Organizational and time-management skills for meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Desire to continue building a skill set with education and training.
Should have worked with different clients.
Should have exposure to working in a marketing agency.
Should have excellent video editing and static skills.
Keywords: Graphic Designing, Visual Communication, Adobe Premiere Pro, Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Graphic Designer

Collecting details and supplies to prepare analysis to be accomplished. The definition of plans through the study of knowledge and materials. Demonstration the definition by designing and copying rough art layouts in terms of composition, scale, form scale and style, and related aesthetic principles.

Graphic Designer Job Responsibilities:
Plans and illustrates concepts by designing rough layouts of art and copy regarding arrangement, size, type size and style, and related aesthetics.
Coordinates with internal teams, including marketing, in the design concept phase through completion of a project.
Obtains approval of concepts by preparing rough layouts for review.
Prepares final layout by marking and pasting up finished copy and art.
Obtains final copy and art by operating typesetting, printing, and similar equipment and by making purchases from vendors when required.
Ensures operation of design equipment and software by completing preventive maintenance requirements; following manufacturers instructions; troubleshooting malfunctions; calling for repairs; maintaining equipment inventories; and evaluating new equipment.
Coordinates with outside agencies, art services, printers, etc. to complete projects.
Maintains technical knowledge by attending design workshops; reviewing professional publications; and participating in professional societies.

Graphic Designer Qualifications/Skills:
Strong graphic design skills
Layout skills
Analytical skills
Creativity
Flexibility
Attention to detail
Deadline-oriented
Desktop publishing tools and graphic design software
Acute vision
Time-management skills
Communication skills
Handles rejection

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Video Creation and Editing:
1. Plan, shoot, and edit video content for various platforms, including social media, websites, and YouTube.
2. Work with the marketing team to conceptualize video concepts and storyboards.
3. Edit and enhance video footage, add graphics, animations, and sound to create compelling videos.
4. Manage and organize video assets, ensuring efficient workflow and accessibility.
5. Stay current with video editing software, techniques, and trends.
Multimedia Production:
1. Combine graphic design and video production skills to create multimedia content that tells a compelling story.
2. Collaborate with colleagues to brainstorm and develop multimedia campaigns that engage and resonate with the target audience.
3. Ensure that multimedia content aligns with brand guidelines and maintains a consistent visual identity.
Graphic Design:
1. Create eye-catching graphics for a variety of marketing materials, including social media, websites, print collateral, and presentations.
2. Develop and maintain a cohesive visual identity for the brand, ensuring consistency in design elements.
3. Collaborate with the marketing team to conceptualize and design engaging visual content for online and offline campaigns.
4. Produce high-quality illustrations, infographics, and icons to convey complex information in a visually appealing way.
5. Stay updated on design trends and best practices to continually improve the quality of design work.
Quality Control:
1. Review and proofread all design and video work to ensure accuracy, consistency, and quality.
2. Implement feedback and make necessary revisions to improve designs and videos.
Project Management:
1. Manage multiple design and video projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met.
2. Communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver on project objectives.
3. Keep projects organized and maintain clear documentation.
Required Skills:
1)Bachelor's degree in Multimedia Arts, video Production, Graphic Design, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
2)Proven experience as a video creator/editor and graphic designer with a strong portfolio showcasing relevant work.
3)Proficiency in graphic design software (Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects CC, Illustrators, or similar).
4)Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and composition.
5)Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines.
6)Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
7)A keen eye for detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work.
8)Knowledge of 2D and 3D animation is a plus.
Keywords: Illustrator, Adobe premium Pro, After effects, Graphic Designing, Video Editing, Video creation, Social Media posting

Job Description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Graphic Designer to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, and Photoshop for graphic design and illustration. Additionally, the candidate should have expertise in video editing using software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro. This role will require the ability to create visually compelling graphics for both print and digital media, as well as edit and produce engaging video content.
Key Responsibilities:
Graphic Design:
Create captivating visual designs, illustrations, and layouts for a range of digital and print materials including websites, social media, marketing collateral, presentations, and advertisements using Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, and Photoshop.
Video Editing:
Edit and produce high-quality video content, ensuring seamless integration of visuals, audio, and effects using Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro.
Brand Management:
Maintain brand consistency across all design and video materials, adhering to established brand guidelines.
Collaboration:
Work closely with cross-functional teams to interpret concepts and messaging into compelling visuals and video content.
Continuous Learning:
Stay updated with industry trends, design tools, and video editing techniques to enhance the quality and effectiveness of designs.
Project Management:
Manage multiple projects concurrently, ensuring deadlines are met and priorities are managed efficiently.
Client Interaction:
Engage with clients to understand their design and video needs, present concepts, and incorporate feedback into final deliverables.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field (preferred).
Proven experience in graphic design and video editing with a strong portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design and video work.
Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro.
Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout techniques.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.

Job Description:
**Job Summary:**
The Presentation Architect/ Specialist is responsible for creating visually appealing, impactful, and informative PowerPoint presentations to effectively communicate concepts, ideas, and information. This role involves collaborating with various teams to understand presentation requirements, designing compelling visuals, and delivering engaging presentations that align with the company's goals and messaging.

**Responsibilities:**
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather presentation requirements, including content, objectives, target audience, and desired outcomes.
Develop creative and visually appealing PowerPoint presentations that effectively convey complex ideas, data, and information.
Design and format slides, incorporating appropriate visuals, charts, graphs, images, and multimedia elements.
Ensure consistency in branding, messaging, and design across all presentation materials.
Edit and refine existing presentations to enhance their visual impact and clarity.
Translate technical and complex information into easily understandable slides.
Stay updated with design trends and best practices to enhance the visual quality of presentations.
Work closely with subject matter experts to validate content accuracy and relevance.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and maintaining high-quality output.
Provide guidance and recommendations to presenters on effective presentation delivery techniques.
Assist in creating templates and style guides to streamline the presentation creation process.
Support other design-related tasks as needed, such as creating graphics for marketing materials.

**Qualifications:**
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Communication, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Proficiency in Microsoft PowerPoint, including advanced skills in slide layout, design, and animation.
Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual communication.
Experience in creating presentations that cater to different audiences and purposes (e.g., internal meetings, client presentations, training sessions).
Familiarity with data visualization techniques and tools for creating compelling charts and graphs.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in design and branding.
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Time management skills to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines effectively.
Experience with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) or other graphic design software is a plus.
Portfolio showcasing previous presentation design work is highly desirable.
Keywords: presentation design, graphic designing, data visualization, powerpoint, communication skills, graphic design software, adobe creative suite, infographics, visual communication, photoshop, graphics, creative, illustrator

Job Description:
As a Junior ID you will prepare proposal presentations (including Canvas 3D and BOQ) for booking stage and sit through the Welcome calls between Customer and Principal Designer and capture the entire discussion and customer requirements. You will raise the request for Site Measurement and prepare the KWS line drawings for Validation. You will coordinate with Principal Designer and Quality Surveyor to determine what all can be pitched to the Client in both
Modular and non-modular services.

Reponsibilities :
Visits the site for Design initiation along with the printouts of DKO presentation, DKO doc and all Canvas wall elevations
During Design Kick-off :
Takes note of the changes discussed during the DKO presentation.
Captures the scope of non-modular services in coordination with the QS personnel.
Capture design inputs from the Customer.
Prepare MoMs and provide it to the PD, who shares the same with the client.
Prepares Canvas 3D and BOQ, basis the discussion with Client during DKO and the design inputs collected.
During Design Meeting at EC :
Incorporate all design inputs taken during EC walk-through in Canvas and get final 3D.
Prepare MoMs along with latest BOQ + 3D screenshots + date & time of Sign-off meeting and shares with the PD.
Prepare KWS production drawings needed for final validation and PO raising
Prepare 3D renders for the design prepared (as per Client requirement).
Prepare the final sign-off document and get it reviewed by the PD.
Visit the site whenever project needs designer intervention.
Keywords: 3D, Quality Surveyor, Principal

Job Description:
Role:

We are looking for an experienced and talented UI Designer to create amazing user experiences. You should have an eye for clean design, possess superior UI skills and be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts, and transform them into beautiful, intuitive, and functional user interfaces. You should be able to set the creative direction for the products under your control. You may be required to manage a team and will be required to interact with clients.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with product management and engineering to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals and experience
Execute all visual design stages from concept to hand-off to engineering and quality control of the final product output
Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design roadblocks
Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas
Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to peers, executive level stakeholders and clients
Conduct user research and evaluate user feedback
Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards
Manage a team and manage the product delivery process from a design standpoint.

Requirements

Proven UI experience
Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio
Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps
Proficiency in the following tools: Photoshop, Illustrator, Invision, Sketch or other visual design and wire-framing tools
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for rapid prototyping.
Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
Ability to present your designs and sell your solutions to various stakeholders.
Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively
Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and creative Web and Graphic Designer to join our team. As a Web and Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and user-friendly designs for our websites, applications, and marketing materials. Your expertise in both web and graphic design will be crucial in crafting engaging experiences for our users and enhancing our brand presence.
Responsibilities
Collaborate with the marketing and development teams to understand project requirements and objectives.
Create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces for websites, web applications, and mobile apps.
Design eye-catching graphics and illustrations for marketing materials, including brochures, banners, and social media posts.
Develop wireframes, prototypes, and mockups to effectively communicate design ideas and concepts.
Ensure consistency in design across various platforms, maintaining brand identity and guidelines.
Optimize designs for web and mobile responsiveness, usability, and performance.
Stay updated with design trends and emerging technologies, continuously improving design skills and knowledge.
Collaborate with developers to ensure seamless implementation of designs.
Requirements
Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a Web and Graphic Designer. Maximum 5 years.
Strong proficiency in design software such as Figma, Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Sketch.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is preferred but not required.
Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
Experience in creating responsive web designs and familiarity with mobile-first design concepts.
Excellent knowledge of typography, color theory, and composition.
Strong portfolio demonstrating a diverse range of web and graphic design projects.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Exceptional attention to detail and a passion for creating exceptional user experiences.
Bachelor s degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Web Design, or a related field (preferred but not required).
To apply for this position, please include the following:
A detailed resume highlighting your relevant work experience and technical skills.
A portfolio showcasing your web and graphic design projects. Please provide a link to your portfolio or attach relevant samples.
Benefits
Hybrid working model
Competitive salary based on experience and skill level.
Collaborative and supportive work environment.
Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the growth of the company.
Work-life balance: working 40 hours per week
Keywords: Graphics, Graphic designing, PDF, Web technologies, Illustrator, Social media, Javascript, HTML, JPEG, Web designing
