Job Description:
The Web and Graphic Designer is responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly designs for websites, digital marketing materials, and other brand assets
They will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand design requirements, develop design concepts, and execute design projects
The Web and Graphic Designer will apply creative and technical skills to deliver high-quality designs that align with the organization's brand guidelines and objectives
Design and develop visually engaging and user-friendly websites, landing pages, and digital marketing materials using HTML, CSS, and web design tools
Create compelling and innovative graphic designs for online and offline marketing collateral, including banners, brochures, infographics, and social media visuals
Collaborate with the marketing and content teams to understand design requirements, objectives, and target audience to deliver effective design solutions
Maintain brand consistency by adhering to brand guidelines and ensuring design elements reflect the organization's visual identity
Conduct research and stay updated on design trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to enhance design concepts and strategies
Translate complex concepts into clear and visually appealing designs that effectively communicate key messages
Collaborate with developers, UX/UI designers, and content creators to ensure seamless integration of design elements and optimal user experience
Ensure timely delivery of design projects, managing multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously
Review and provide constructive feedback on design deliverables produced by other team members or external vendors
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new design software, and technologies to continually enhance design skills and knowledge
Qualifications and Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in graphic design, web design, or a related field
Equivalent work experience will also be considered
Proven experience as a web and graphic designer, with a portfolio demonstrating proficiency in web and graphic design
Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and web design tools (eg, Sketch, Figma)
Strong understanding of responsive web design principles and experience in coding HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery
Knowledge of user experience (UX) design principles and the ability to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces
Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) and web development frameworks
Creativity and ability to think critically to develop innovative design concepts and solutions
Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality designs within specified timelines
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to effectively work with cross-functional teams and stakeholders
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Understanding of branding principles and the ability to create designs that align with brand guidelines
Knowledge of digital marketing trends and best practices
Experience in video editing and motion graphics is a plus
Continuous learning mindset, staying updated on design trends, technologies, and industry advancements

2 to 4 years of experience as IT Web and Graphic Designer

Job Description:
As a Web/Graphic Designer, your role is to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs for websites, applications, and various digital platforms
You combine your creativity with technical skills to develop designs that effectively communicate messages and engage users
Here are some key skills and responsibilities of a Web/Graphic Designer:
Design skills: You possess a strong understanding of design principles, color theory, typography, and layout
You have expertise in design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, or other relevant tools
Web design: You create website layouts, user interfaces (UI), and interactive elements that provide a seamless user experience
You are familiar with responsive design techniques, ensuring that designs are optimized for various devices and screen sizes
Graphic design: You develop visually appealing graphics, illustrations, icons, and other visual elements that convey messages effectively
You may create logos, marketing materials, infographics, or other graphics as needed
User experience (UX) design: You focus on creating designs that enhance the user experience by considering user needs, usability, and accessibility
You conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and iterate on designs based on user feedback
Branding and visual identity: You develop and maintain consistent branding and visual identity guidelines across digital platforms
You ensure that designs align with the brand's tone, values, and target audience
Keywords: Graphics, User research, Software design, Graphic designing, Illustrator, Web designing, Photoshop

Job Description: Web Graphic Designer Web graphic designers create determine the layout, font color, font type, logos, pictures and other visual and verbal aspects of a website. First, a Web graphic designer determines what the employer wants out of the product. This includes what message is being sent out and what audience is being targeted. They then create sketches and samples of potential layouts for the website, before developing the finished product. Web graphic designers have to possess a keen eye for detail. The ability to express creative ideas is crucial. Understanding new fads and trends is necessary. A Web graphic designer has to understand a target audience and how best to reach that audience through artistic work. This career requires a lot of discipline since a Web graphic designer has to start projects, budget time and meet the necessary deadlines placed upon them by an employer. Illustrator An illustrator uses creative skills in art and design to communicate a story, message or idea. Illustrators produce still drawings for use in advertisements, books, magazines, packaging, greetings cards and newspapers. It is essential to prepare a sound portfolio of work that can be used to demonstrate abilities.
Keywords: Usage, Web technologies, Illustrator, Packaging, Budgeting, Business Executive

Job Description:
What you will be responsible for:
A senior creative designer - experienced user-experience (UX) designer able to measure, optimize and understand our business requirements and any technical limitations to improve ease of use (usability), as well as be responsible for conceiving and conducting user research, surveys, and translating them into user flows, A creative designer should create the best user experience by exploring different approaches to provide great customer experience, customer journey mapping and mockups.
The UX designer will also be expected to design the overall functionality of the product, and in order to ensure a great user experience, UX Designer must have a clear understanding of business goals and user behavior, and be proficient in a wide variety of skills, ranging from psychology to design and technology.
Also Iterate upon it in accordance with user-testing. They then refine and tweak Web, App and PWA to create products that users likes and find easy to use.
This stage of career requires you to play an independent contributor role where you are expected to work on specific problems in an independent manner with minimal assistance. This role also requires you to own a small team of designers and work on creating great design and user experience features.
Profile
What you need to succeed in the role:
Design and create graphics of highly robust and scalable applications in a large-scale distributed systems environment
Translating business requirements into creative design and apply deep understanding of principles of design, Invariance , reification for web applications. Offering creative alternatives to business design wherever appropriate
Ownership of complete user experience, which would involve product enhancements and continuous evolution of existing UI.
Having expertise in using Color Theory, Typography Composition in all the web UI including Desktop, PWA and App.
Set creative/web design standards and act as a mentor for younger designers in the organization

Job Description:
About Us:
We are Vikay Mining Equipments, a merchant exporter for industrial tools and parts. As we transition to the Wix platform for our website, we are seeking a creative and talented Graphic Designer and Social Media Specialist to join our team.

Job Summary:
As a Graphic Web Designer at Vikay, you will utilise your advanced knowledge of the Wix platform to create and maintain visually appealing and functional websites for our company. Also you will work with our team to design and maintain web pages that effectively communicate our brand and engage our audience. This role will play a crucial part in enhancing our brand presence through engaging graphic design work and effective social media strategies.

Key Responsibilities:
Wix Expertise: You will be responsible for creating visually stunning and user-friendly web pages using the Wix platform
Graphic Design: Design eye-catching graphics, images, and other visual elements for websites, landing pages, and digital marketing campaigns.
Responsive Design: Ensure that all web designs are responsive and optimised for various devices and screen sizes.
UI/UX Optimisation: Implement user-centric design principles to enhance the overall user experience on our websites.
Website Maintenance: Regularly update and maintain existing websites, ensuring content is up-to-date and error-free.
SEO Optimisation: Implement basic SEO best practices to improve website visibility and search engine rankings.
Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with industry trends, web design best practices, and emerging technologies to continually improve our web design capabilities.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design work, particularly for digital platforms.
Proficiency in graphic design software such as Photoshop and Corel Draw
Familiarity with website management and content management systems (CMS), preferably Wix.
Demonstrated expertise in creating and executing successful social media campaigns across various platforms.
Creative thinking and problem-solving skills to overcome design and marketing challenges.
Strong organisational skills and attention to detail to manage multiple projects and deadlines effectively.
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Digital Media, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

Preferred:
Experience specifically with Wix platform and website migration.
Basic understanding of HTML and CSS for minor website adjustments.
Keywords: Cms Platforms, Corel Draw, Photoshop, WIX platform, User Interface Ui, Figma, WIX, Basic HTML/CSS, CMS development

Job Description:
WebDesignCochin.in, a leading digital marketing company, offers a challenging and rewarding work environment. We at WebDesignCochin.in, collaborate closely with our clients and offer a comprehensive web design and development solution.
With our experience and dedication, we have earned the respect of our clients and a remarkable reputation in the industry. We have an opening for graphic designer and if you think you can match our requirements, please do contact us.
You will work with the client, account manager, or creative director and will build suitable inspired ideas and concepts to meet client objectives.
What you must possess
Relevant qualification in graphic design.
2 to 3 years practical experience in graphic design industry.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Excellent design, visualization, and creative skills.
Good presentation skills with the aptitude and confidence to explain ideas to clients and colleagues.
Print, digital design, and production experience across multimedia platforms.
Expertise in developing creative design solutions for multiple marketing and communication campaigns across digital platforms.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Knowledge of the new design software and technologies such as Photoshop, Dreamweaver, InDesign, Illustrator, and similar.
A motivated team player, flexible and a strong positive attitude.
Ability to work independently and deliver results meeting client requirements.
Manage multiple projects and produce quality results.

Position responsibilities:
1. Meet the client team to discuss about the project details and their business objectives.
2. Build a timeframe and an estimate of the costs of the projects to the client
3. Create and present a mockup design based on the client ideas
4. Guide the client and present a final design plan for approval
5. Amend design after getting a feedback
6. Use the latest software versions when creating the final product
7. Collaborate with the top illustrators, copywriters, designers, photographers etc. as required for the project.
Keywords: Communication Skills, Creative Skills, Illustrator, Social Media Manager, Dreamweaver, Digital Marketing, Photoshop, Graphic Design, Indesign, Graphic Designer

Job Description:
A web graphic designer is responsible for creating visual elements for websites, including layout, colour scheme, and user interface design. This role involves working with clients or a design team to develop a cohesive look and feel for a website, as well as creating graphics and other visual elements to support the overall design.
Some specific responsibilities of a web graphic designer may include:
Collaborating with clients or team members to determine the overall look and feel of a website
Designing website layouts, including page structure, navigation, and user flow
Creating visual elements such as graphics, icons, and banners to support the overall design
Implementing responsive design principles to ensure a consistent user experience across different devices
Using design software such as Adobe Creative Suite to create and edit graphics
Staying up-to-date with the latest design trends and best practices
To be successful in this role, a web graphic designer should have a strong understanding of design principles and a keen eye for aesthetics. Experience with design software such as Adobe Creative Suite is essential, as is the ability to work effectively with clients or team members. Good communication skills and the ability to work under tight deadlines are also important in this role.
Keywords: Graphics, Software design, Web technologies, User interface designing, adobe creative suite

Job Description:
Responsible for the strategic planning and design of telecom infrastructure and/or network components
Analyses the short-term and/or long-term network capacity needs for current and future network requirements
This includes technology and network planning acorss multiple layers, introduction of new technologies into the network for new services and/or better network efficiency

Also responsible for equipment planning via rfp while working along with commercial team

Regularly participate in important projects or activities as a full contributing team member, is able to proactively identify important issues or risks, seeks the appropriate level of guidance and advice to ensure delivery of quality outcomes
Operational role which is responsible for delivering results that have direct impact on the achievement of results within Platform Planning and Design
Works under direct supervision
Able to identify problems and provide inputs to improve, change or adapt existing methods and techniques drawing from personal experiences and feedback
Actively acquires more complex skills, techniques, operating practices, knowledge of abstract concepts in order to progress toward full proficiency in the field of specialisation
Has skills and knowledge that will allow them to adapt to effectively deal with unfamiliar issues, challenges, problems within their field of specialisation

Job Description:
Website Design and Layout: Create visually appealing and user-friendly website designs that align with client requirements and brand guidelines
Develop wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to demonstrate design concepts and obtain client feedback
Ensure designs are responsive and optimized for various devices and screen sizes
Graphic Design and Branding: Develop graphics, icons, illustrations, and other visual elements that enhance the overall look and feel of the website
Apply branding elements, such as logos, colors, and typography, consistently throughout the website to maintain brand identity and recognition
User Experience (UX) Design: Focus on creating a positive user experience by understanding target audiences, their needs, and their browsing behaviors
Apply UX design principles to optimize website navigation, information architecture, and interaction design
Conduct usability testing and gather feedback to improve the user experience
Front-end Development: Convert design concepts into functional web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and adherence to web standards and best practices
Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate front-end designs with content management systems or e-commerce platforms
Content Creation and Management: Collaborate with content creators and copywriters to develop engaging and compelling website content
Organize and structure content effectively, ensuring readability and easy access to information
Implement content management systems to facilitate content updates and maintenance
Visual and Multimedia Elements: Incorporate multimedia elements, such as images, videos, animations, and interactive features, to enhance the website's visual appeal and user engagement
Optimize multimedia assets for web delivery and performance
Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Apply basic SEO principles during the website design process to ensure optimized page titles, meta descriptions, URLs, and other on-page elements
Collaborate with SEO specialists to ensure proper website indexing, keyword integration, and site performance optimization
Website Maintenance and Updates: Monitor and maintain the performance and functionality of websites, including regular backups, security updates, and bug fixes
Respond to client requests for content updates, design changes, or technical troubleshooting in a timely manner
Keywords: Web technologies, Web designing, SEO

Job Description:
We are seeking a creative and talented graphic designer to join our marketing team and assist us in creating engaging visual content for our brand. You will work closely with our graphic designers and marketing managers on various design projects, including social media graphics, web pages, logos, flyers, brochures, and more.
As a graphic designer, your responsibilities will include:
Utilizing graphic design software and tools to create and modify graphics, illustrations, layouts, and other design elements.
Collaborating with the creative team and adhering to brand guidelines to develop design concepts and ideas.
Receiving feedback from sales and marketing managers and incorporating necessary changes.
Preparing images and files for printing or digital platforms.
Managing your time and deadlines efficiently to complete assigned tasks promptly.
The roles and responsibilities of the graphic designer include:
Showcasing a portfolio of your previous graphic design work, demonstrating your skills and creativity.
Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and other graphic design software.
Knowledge of graphic design principles such as typography, color theory, layout, and white space.
Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Attention to detail and a commitment to quality.
A degree in graphic design or a related field, or currently pursuing such a degree.

Job Description:
Job Description
As a graphic designer on our team, you can expect to work on a variety of interesting
projects. Below, we've listed some examples of projects that you may work on.
UI Design
1. Create responsive wireframes, low fidelity designs and high fidelity
designs for Apps, Websites, Landing Pages and other marketing
collaterals.
Banners
2. Create assets for digital ads, social content, and offline media such as
billboards
3. Design banners for storefront collections that enable our customers to
easily recognize a distinct look to each collection, such as our Slumber
sleep collection.
Email Design
1. As we prefer to rely on organic growth and word of mouth traffic, email
has become the cornerstone to our marketing efforts. As such, it's
paramount that we have the highest quality of email possible.
2. Design unique, beautiful email campaigns for product launches, blog
posts, press hits, etc.
3. Design on-brand transactional emails for automated flows such as
abandoned cart notifications, back-in-stock reminders, welcome emails,
etc.
Packaging

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Graphic Designer with 3-6 yrs of experience in PowerPoint to join our team
As a Graphic Designer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing the visual appeal and effectiveness of our presentations by transforming complex information into engaging, visually compelling PowerPoint slides
You will collaborate closely with various teams to understand their content requirements and deliver exceptional designs that effectively convey key messages and concepts
Responsibilities :
Create visually appealing and professional PowerPoint presentations that align with the companys brand guidelines and objectives
Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including subject matter experts, executives, and project managers, to understand content requirements and objectives
Transform raw data, text, and concepts into visually compelling and easy-to-understand PowerPoint slides, using appropriate typography, imagery, color schemes, and graphic elements
Design and format slide templates, master slides, and layout options to ensure consistency and streamline the presentation creation process
Enhance existing PowerPoint presentations by incorporating engaging visual elements, infographics, charts, and diagrams
Optimize slide layouts for readability, visual impact, and seamless information flow
Ensure all presentations adhere to established corporate guidelines, maintaining a consistent look and feel across different projects
Keep up to date with industry trends, design techniques, and emerging PowerPoint features to continuously improve the quality of presentations
Collaborate with the marketing and design teams to develop visual assets, such as icons, illustrations, and images, for use in presentations
Handle multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines and maintaining high-quality standards
Qualifications :
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong focus on PowerPoint presentations
Proficiency in PowerPoint, including advanced knowledge of slide layouts, animation effects, and visual enhancements
Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual hierarchy
Strong portfolio showcasing your PowerPoint design skills and ability to transform complex content into visually compelling slides
Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Photoshop and Illustrator
Excellent attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work in a fast-paced environment
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Ability to handle constructive feedback and iterate on designs accordingly
Knowledge of corporate branding and ability to apply brand guidelines consistently
Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Keywords: Graphic designing, Quality standards, Illustrator, adobe creative suite, Artificial Intelligence, Focus, Corporate branding, Animation, Photoshop, Powerpoint
